column2: Project Role : Program/Project Management Lead Project Role Description : Lead business and technology outcomes for assigned program, project, or contracted service. Leverage standard tools, methodologies and processes to deliver, monitor, and control service level agreements.  Must have skills : Agile Program Management Good to have skills : Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK) Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Btech Summary :As an Agile Program Management Lead, you will be responsible for leading business and technology outcomes for assigned programs, projects, or contracted services. Your typical day will involve leveraging standard tools, methodologies, and processes to deliver, monitor, and control service level agreements.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the planning and execution of Agile programs and projects, ensuring alignment with business goals and objectives. Facilitate Agile ceremonies, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and mitigate risks, resolve issues, and ensure timely delivery of program and project outcomes. Provide leadership and guidance to project teams, ensuring adherence to Agile principles and best practices. Communicate program and project status, risks, and issues to stakeholders, including senior leadership, utilizing effective communication and presentation skills. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Expertise in Agile program management methodologies and practices. Good To Have Skills:Knowledge of Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK). Strong understanding of project management principles and best practices. Experience in leading cross-functional teams in Agile environments. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Agile program management. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in project management, business administration, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering successful Agile programs and projects. This position is based at our Hyderabad office. Qualification Btech

Must have skills : SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Payroll Good to have skills : SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 Years Continuous education  Summary :As a Program/Project Management Lead for SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Payroll, you will be responsible for leading business and technology outcomes for assigned programs and projects. Your typical day will involve leveraging standard tools, methodologies, and processes to deliver, monitor, and control service level agreements.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the planning, execution, and delivery of SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Payroll projects, ensuring adherence to project timelines, budgets, and quality standards. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders, technical teams, and vendors, to ensure successful project outcomes. Develop and maintain project plans, status reports, and other project-related documentation. Manage project risks and issues, identifying and implementing mitigation strategies as needed. Ensure compliance with project management methodologies and best practices, including Agile and Waterfall methodologies. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Expertise in SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Payroll. Good To Have Skills:Experience with SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central. Strong understanding of project management methodologies and best practices, including Agile and Waterfall methodologies. Experience in leading cross-functional teams and managing project risks and issues. Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Payroll. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, engineering, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering successful SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Payroll projects. This position is based at our Mumbai office. Qualification 15 Years Continuous education

column2: The Project Manager will oversee and manage projects from inception to completion, ensuring they are completed on time and within scope and budget. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in project management, excellent communication skills, and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.  Key Responsibilities:   Project Planning:  Define project scope, goals, and deliverables in collaboration with client management and client stakeholders.  Resource Management:  Allocate and manage resources to ensure optimal project execution.  Timeline Management:  Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, milestones, and deliverables, and monitor and report on progress.  Stakeholder Communication:  Maintain regular communication with stakeholders, providing updates and ensuring alignment with project objectives.  Risk Management:  Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to minimize project disruptions.  Quality Assurance:  Ensure that projects meet quality standards and comply with relevant regulations and best practices.  Team Leadership:  Lead and motivate project teams, fostering a collaborative and productive work environment.  Documentation:  Maintain comprehensive project documentation, including project plans, status reports, and meeting minutes.  Post-Project Evaluation:  Conduct post-project reviews to evaluate project outcomes, identify lessons learned, and make recommendations for future improvements.  Should be a fast learner, and should be fine to work with Mexican stakeholders
column11: Project Evaluation, Program Management, Project Planning, Resource Management

column2: As a Principal Project Management Specialist at Medtronic, the individual will play a vital role in supporting the development and execution of strategic programs.          Responsibilities include:             Leading the planning, execution, and monitoring of strategic programs to ensure alignment with organizational objectives.     Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define project scope, goals, and deliverables.     Developing and maintaining detailed project plans, timelines, and resource allocation schedules.     Conducting thorough analysis of program performance metrics, identifying trends, and providing actionable insights.     Preparing and presenting regular progress reports, status updates, and recommendations to senior management and stakeholders.     Proactively identifying risks, issues, and dependencies and developing mitigation strategies.     Serving as a subject matter expert on program management best practices.     Fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement within the program management team.             ?       Principal Working Relationships:                The Principal Project Management Specialist reports to Program/Senior Program Manager and partners with engineering leaders     Key liaisons include technical leads, core team members, other project managers, and GBU stakeholders     This position is responsible for leading and managing the day-to-day operations for complex projects and serves as the Single Point of Contact (SPOC)           Experience:         Minimum of 13 years of relevant experience with at least 5 years in a project leadership role.     Hands-on experience in Supply chain projects preferred.     Hands-on experience in Agile methodology preferred.     Project experience in mechanical, enterprise software development preferred.             Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities:           Familiarity with FDA Quality System Regulations, European Regulatory Requirements, and IEC-62304.         Strong project management skills with a track record of managing projects to schedule, budget, and scope.           Proficiency in project management tools (e.g., MS Project, Jira, Confluence).     Experience with Agile, Waterfall, or SDLC methodologies and processes.     Excellent interpersonal, influence management, and conflict resolution skills.     Ability to manage teams with diverse cultural backgrounds.     Strong written, verbal, and presentation skills.     Effective planning and organization skills, including the ability to work against multiple objectives simultaneously.     Proficiency in Microsoft Office products.
column11: Supply chain, PMP, Supply chain management, Agile, Healthcare, Project planning, Continuous improvement, Principal, Monitoring, SDLC

column2: We are looking for an Operation Manager who would be responsible to run the cloud infrastructure support function for one of our estmeed client. This role may include execution of small projects to run within the operation.     Please read the job criteria below and drop us an email at OR create an account at our      to get started.       Roles Responsibilities:         As a part of an agile team environment, you are expected to independently work on end-to-end target delivery which includes          Analyze projected work volume and allocate resources to team leads based on capacity availability and SLA targets.         Ensure staffing and performance levels are correct to handle appropriate amounts of work volume.         Work closely with leads to decide the team rostering, shifts and team allocation         Coordinates with Team Leads and resources as needed to ensure on-time delivery.         Analyze workload, capacity planning and resource allocation forecasting.         Participate and present data to discuss trends, status and action plans to meet targets.         Proactively communicate to adjust the workforce plan based on changing volume.         Effectively lead, motivate and direct the workgroup while being flexible in a changing environment.         Effective communication to internal and external stakeholders on Operation status and changes.         Performance management of team: Define, track and monitor KRAs for Leads and team.         Accountable for adhering to defined SLA for key KPIs like Customer Satisfaction(CSAT), Customer Effort Score and Productivity.         Hiring support- Proactively work with recruitment team to ensure right team is in place         Work with Learning and development team to ensure right induction plan is in place.         Job    Requirements/Qualifications   :           Educational Qualification: Graduation             Should have 8+ years of hands-on progressive project/operations management work experience in fast-paced development/operations organization.             Should have experience in running 24*7 support operation.             Should have hands-on experience in Reporting, building Weekly, Monthly and Quarterly reports.             Should have excellent communication (written and verbal skills), influencing and presentation skills, with excellent attention to detail.             Deep insight of tools like Looker, Zendesk, etc is an added advantage.             Should be able to communicate with the client, understand client requirements and provide data required by the client in a timely manner             Should have experience in similar roles leading/managing global projects, which is essential for this role.             Should be Data driven, result-oriented and should have proven ability to reach and exceed goals/targets in a dynamic environment.             Should have proven skills in developing effective partnerships with key stakeholders and providing leadership support for driving change initiatives.             Should have hands-on experience with a strong working knowledge of project management practices, ticket management tools and modern communication tools like Slack

column2: The Scrum Master coaches, guides and facilitates Agile software development by leading highly collaborative, organized and accountable teams to meet business goals and deliver customer value.       Seeking an experienced and talented Scrum Master to lead a highly skilled development team. This is an excellent opportunity for a self-driven servant leader that will be empowered with the ability to establish goals and create plans to help drive their team towards maximizing their potential.       This position will work closely with Product Management, Software Engineering, and QA to guide Scrum activities including story refinement, sprint planning, daily standups, software releases, and retrospectives. You also will strive to keep the team focused and help to reduce obstacles that impede team progress. Our ideal candidate should have strong communication skills, be process-driven, inquisitive, and be able to pick up new knowledge and skills independently.       Responsibilities       Duties and Responsibilities:       Guiding the team and organization on how to use Agile/Scrum practices and values to deliver excellent products to customers.     Organize and lead Scrum ceremonies.     Guiding the team on how to get the most out of self-organization.     Helping the team achieve higher levels of scrum maturity.     Providing all support to the team using a servant leadership style whenever possible and leading by example.     Taking responsibility of projects through their entire lifecycle including management of project personnel.     Oversee and manage scope, timeline, quality, goals and deliverables that support business goals.     Removing impediments or guiding the team to remove impediments.     Ensuring that all relevant processes are followed on projects.     Following continual improvement processes and increasing transparency.     Facilitating getting the work done without coercion or dictating the work.     Facilitating discussion, decision making, empowerment, and conflict resolution.     Supporting the Product Owner, especially on refining and maintaining the product backlog.         Desired Competencies:         Ability to collaborate with and lead a Scrum Team.     Experience with implementing successful Agile techniques across web and mobile products using Kanban.     Excellent verbal and written communication and listening skills.     Knowledge and awareness of Project Management principles, documents and plans.     Ability to adapt to a changing environment.     Ability to analyze and think quickly and to resolve conflict.     Ability to deliver results on time, within budget, and to the very highest standards.     Project reporting and stakeholder management.
column11: Product management, Project reports, Web technologies, Conflict resolution, Project management, Agile, Scrum, Scheduling, Stakeholder management, Business operations

column2: The web project manager plays an important role in the growth of Fingerprints UI UX Department     He/She will manage digital projects of varying sizes and complexity using agile methods, working with business stakeholders and a solution delivery team to develop new features, implement user interface (UI) changes, and implement or develop key applications     The role holder will possess a thorough understanding of the scope and capabilities of modern web technologies, as well as strong project management skills gained in an agile, digital environment and good interpersonal and communication skills     They will manage product backlogs, create roadmaps and release schedules, and manage risks and issues proactively     They will define requirements in collaboration with users and the business     The role holder will serve as a vital link between the user experience (UX), content, and software development teams, ensuring that design changes and new features are defined in the most appropriate ways for front end and back end developers     Although this is not a hands-on technical role, they will understand the needs of developers and technical staff and be able to effectively communicate with them     The web project manager will be a member of the group web team, with the head of group web holding the formal reporting line               Responsibilities:             Plan projects and assign resources effectively, taking into account constraints and flagging potential resource shortfalls in good time      In partnership with the web development team leader direct the work of web developers (in-house and external) to achieve project goals      Interpret user and business needs and outputs from UI, visual and content design and turn them into appropriate specifications for web developers      Plan and execute user acceptance testing for all development projects, including directing and managing independent testers      Research and scope new requirements and assist in the design of UI components      Work with clients to analyse business requirements, scope, and technicalities associated with the product.      Track project plans to ensure milestones are met on a consistent basis.      Single Point Of Contact for all communications from the client to the team      Manage changes to the scope, schedule, costs, and timelines for the project.      Create project plans from the scope.                Must Haves:             Significant project management experience in a web/digital context, using primarily agile methods, and working on projects of various sizes and complexity.      Experience in working with web content management systems and large, complex websites. Experience in directing and motivating staff not under direct line management responsibility.      Good research, analytical and problem-solving skills. Organisational and prioritisation skills.      Strong verbal and written communication skills, including the ability to communicate with others at all levels and translate technical jargon into clear English. Ability to learn quickly and to respond positively to a rapidly changing work area.

column2: We are seeking a talented Scrum Manager to join our Technology Department. Reporting directly to the Chief Technology Officer (CTO), you will be responsible for overseeing and managing various project scrum processes. As a Scrum Manager, you will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, Product Owners, and stakeholders to ensure the effective implementation of Agile practices, facilitate scrum ceremonies, and drive continuous improvement in our development processes. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of Agile methodologies, exceptional leadership skills, and a proven track record of successfully managing scrum teams in a fast-paced environment.          Job Roles and Key Deliverables:         Lead and manage multiple project scrum teams within the Technology Department, ensuring the successful delivery of high-quality products within agreed timelines.     Facilitate all scrum ceremonies, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives, ensuring they are conducted effectively and with maximum team participation.     Collaborate with Product Owners and stakeholders to prioritize and groom the product backlog, ensuring alignment with business objectives and customer needs.     Coach and mentor scrum teams, Product Owners, and stakeholders on Agile principles, practices, and values, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and learning.     Track and communicate project progress, dependencies, and risks to stakeholders, ensuring transparency and visibility into the project status.     Identify and address any impediments or roadblocks that may affect team productivity, working collaboratively to find solutions and ensure smooth project execution.     Foster a collaborative and positive team environment, promoting effective communication, collaboration, and knowledge sharing.     Continuously assess and improve Agile processes and practices, implementing best practices and introducing new tools or techniques to enhance team productivity and efficiency.     Stay updated with industry trends, new Agile methodologies, and emerging tools, recommending and implementing changes as appropriate.         Qualification & Experience:         Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Equivalent experience will also be considered.     Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) or similar Agile certifications.     Minimum of 5 years of experience as a Scrum Master or in a similar role.         Key Skills :         Demonstrated experience in leading and managing Agile development teams.,     Strong knowledge and understanding of Agile principles, frameworks (e.g., Scrum, Kanban), and software development practices.,     Experience facilitating scrum ceremonies and coaching teams on Agile practices and values.,     Excellent leadership and communication skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire teams.,     Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines.,     Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution skills, with the ability to address and resolve issues in a timely manner.,Proficiency in Agile project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello) and collaboration platforms.,     Knowledge of the software development life cycle (SDLC) and best practices.,     Experience working in an Agile software development environment, preferably with cross-functional teams.,     Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.,etc.

column2: The day-to-day requirements of the Manager role can be grouped into the broad categories of; Case Execution; Client Business Development and managing Consultants. Managers lead multiple case teams, maintain deep, long-term relationships with multiple clients, and develop expertise in diverse sectors. The specifics of the above categories are set out below.        1. CASE EXECUTION        1.1. Case Cracking:        Provide intellectual leadership, and do so across a variety of case types    Crack cases without substantive Partner direction and without burning teams    Generate insightful hypotheses that frame both team and client thinking    Be a versatile and impactful presenter        1.2. Case Management and Execution        Act as team manager, coach the Consultants on the team and role model    Be able to achieve great results via others    Work to develop a wide range of people ( rock stars and weaker performers)    Be aware of case recoveries    Contribute to the wellbeing and morale of local office        2. CLIENT AND BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT          2.1. Client Results        Focus on client results, and able to convert case findings/recommendations into implementable solutions    Demonstrate ability to understand client needs described outcomes and tailor the case to address the most critical issues    Lead substantive positive outcomes for a range of clients    Demonstrate ability to think and act with strong commercial acumen        2.2. Managing Client Relationships        Build lasting relationships with clients    Manage client relationships professionally competently on day-to-day basis    Invest in client relationships beyond the immediate case      2.3. Managing a team        You will typically lead a team of 3 5 consultants to help clients achieve new performance highs    You will lead the day to day execution of a client project while guiding and developing individual team members    In a collaborative team setting, youll work closely with others but also autonomously with little direction        Qualifications and experience needed          At least 2-3 years in a top-tier management consulting firm with demonstrated project management experience.    Ideal candidate will have 3-5 years post MBA experience and/or a total of 6-8 years experience.    Fluency in English (written and spoken) is essential.    Demonstrated leadership ability in a team environment    Must be open to travel.

column2: Cloud Engagement Manager Experience:- 15 Year Hanu is hiring an Engagement Manager to lead partner, and client teams. Engagement Managers, manage and deliver cloud products and services that enable our customers to realize their business objectives. These professional services engagements focus on the full platform of Cloud customer solutions to help our customers and partners remove constraints and accelerate their journey to Azure.     Roles ResponsibilitiesEngagement Managers help Customers make decisions to meet their technical and business objectives by providing best practices, proactively identifying and closing project gaps. Collaborate with sales, pre-sales, training and support teams to seek to understand our customer s needs, their business, how success is defined, and ensure that we are exceeding expectations in delivery and developing valued solutions .      Experience leveraging formal project management and development methodologies on enterprise level engagements. Possesses a deep knowledge of project management best practices and how to apply them in an effective yet pragmatic way across large, complex projects. Understanding of technology principles and services including infrastructure, business applications, data management, security, application platforms and consumer facing technology.      SOLUTIONS Lead individuals, teams or multiple groups and play an active role in analyzing project goals, creating a plan to achieve those goals, and then driving the team members, customer stakeholders/SMEs and potentially other third parties to achieve those goals while understanding the client environment and any limitations to execution.     ?Actively looks for ways to improve process efficiencies and effectiveness. column2: We are looking for 10+years experienced candidates for this role.      Job Description          Must Have: Bachelor s degree in computer science, Computer Engineering, or a related field.          Must Have: 10+ years of technical experience in software product development with a minimum of 5 years as Scrum Master.          Must have: Servant leadership skills, serving the needs of the team and promoting a collaborative and empowered work environment.          Must have: Hands-on in defining the process for both Kanban and Scrum in JIRA or any other tool and be able to train the team and      manage the defined process, exposure on running PI planning with scaled agile framework. Demonstrate an exceptonal understanding of Scrum, with proven experience on a scrum team. Experience with other practices aligned with SAFe/Lean/Azure DevOps is favourable.          Responsibilities include:          Lead and facilitate key Scrum ceremonies, including Sprint Planning, Daily Stand-ups, Sprint Reviews, and Sprint Retrospectives.Ensure that all team members actively participate in these events.          Coach the development team and product owner on Agile and Scrum practices. Foster a culture of continuous improvement and learning within the team.          Foster collaboration between development teams, operations, and other relevant departments. Ensure alignment with organizational goals and objectives.          Identify and eliminate impediments or obstacles that hinder the teams progress. Work collaboratively with stakeholders to address issues affecting the team.          Support the development team in making decisions and becoming self-organizing. Foster an environment that encourages creativity and innovation          Collaborate closely with the Product Owner to maintain a well-groomed product backlog. Stay up to date with industry best practices in Agile and Scrum. Share knowledge and insights with the team. column2: The Project Manager will manage and successfully deliver Infrastructure and Information Security projects     The Project Manager will report to the Infrastructure Program manager     This person will work closely with Business, Finance, Procurement, Security, Development, and Engineering teams     Success will be measured by meeting timelines and budgets     Performance will be measured by fulfilling the below responsibilities                Responsibilities:          Report project status, outcomes and/or risks to the appropriate management channels and escalate issues, as necessary, according to project work plan.      Establish and maintain processes for managing scope during the project lifecycle, setting quality and performance standards, and assessing risks, reporting deviations escalations to the appropriate program manager.      Create and manage a project plan, capturing key milestones, deliverables, dependencies, and scope changes.      Develop and maintain partnerships with third-party resources, including vendors and researchers.      Assign and monitor resources to ensure project efficiency and maximize deliverables.      Motivate and empower the team to meet objectives, task deadlines, ensuring project team members understand their responsibility area.      Drive cross-functional collaboration across stakeholders within the scope of the project      Oversee multiple project teams to ensure the outputs are delivered as per the project plan and that the project has a continued business justification throughout its entire life cycle.      Collaborate with relevant stakeholders to forecast costs and timeframes.      Work with the technology and delivery teams to organize and compile project estimates as relevant.      Create corresponding cost models to track and monitor actual project spend to date, monitoring financial risk.      Follow best-practice guidance from PMO.      Ensure clear understanding of project requirements through transparent communication and effective change management.      Facilitate the production of any key project governance documentation e.g., business cases, funding requests, progress reports, end project report, risk register (RAID log), lesson learned log and project team action plans.      Identify key project phase changes where decision points are required.      Schedule and facilitate project progress meetings and publish meeting minutes.      Ensure project team follow ways of working e.g., utilizing project document repository, escalation paths, ways of working          Requirements:          At least 3 years experience of technical project management using both waterfall and Agile methodologies.      Experience working across multiple IT workstreams such as Business Systems, Infrastructure Information Security.      Work effectively in a matrix organization structure with significant emphasis on collaboration, influence, and persuasion.      Experience in the delivery of end-to-end business transformation.      Experience in large scale project delivery, that are cross organizational and multiyear in delivery.      Experience in managing the expectations of executives and senior management. Manage the delivery of organisation wide IT projects and ensure delivery is within scope and budget. Update the PPM reporting system properly on all initiatives and strategic projects. Assign day-to day project admin to team; ensuring right capabilities and work load allocated.              Assist functional project teams in project implementation, change management and realised benefits analysis in order to have efficient teams implementing projects professionally. Relationship Management              Manage all contracts and other project related commitments efficiently to increase operational efficiency, cost performance and accuracy.              Develop strong vendor relationships to ensure high quality of deliverables for continuous cost improvement or value creation initiatives. Analysis and Reporting              Assist in managing the process of periodic management reporting on project status (i.e. schedule, costs, activities, opportunities and risks); ensuring full visibility of progress by Management and the Executive Committee.              Assist in conducting Risk Assessment analysis for client projects and ensure any risks and issues are resolved promptly and effectively & Resolutions for major projects. Define and communicate Strategy that balances the needs of the Enterprise and the Business domains              Lead the digital transformation initiatives as per organization needs.              Keen to initiate and propose the new technological advancements and best practices.              Collaboration with other departments/entities to ensure alignment of strategic objectives.              Work with business stakeholders to map business requirements to digital/system/technology components.              Work to enhance the capability of IT by identifying and building roadmaps for when and where significant business process improvement and other technical projects are needed and deliver expected business outcomes.              Oversee projects and programs to ensure success in each of the project s nine knowledge areas: Integration, budget, scope, schedule, quality, resources, communications, risk, and procurement              Own and develop a fit for purpose Data & Analytics vision and roadmap for the aligned domain in the organization.              Design and align Analytics & Business Intelligence Solutions with enterprise architecture and facilitated SAP practices COMMUNICATIONS & WORKING RELATIONSHIPS: Internal: Reasons for Interaction:              All Departments              Manage, monitor and coordinate different projects External:              Third party consultants /contractors Reasons for Interaction:              Manage relationship to ensure delivery on JOB DESCRIPTION Updated on: 3 commitment.              Clarify any issues with regards to services delivered and payments to be made QUALIFICATIONS, EXPERIENCE, & SKILLS: Educational Qualifications:              Bachelor s degree in IT, Project Management, Business Administration or an equivalent degree.              Project Management Certifications & Accreditation (PMP) Years of Experience              Over 10 years of experience in previous roles with strategy, project management and execution and transformation responsibility. Other requirements              Fluent in English (Arabic is preferred).              Long term strategic perspective.              Detail-oriented, efficient and organized.              Responds well in fast-paced, high-pressure environment.              Good communication and influencing skills.              Strong leadership, negotiation and conflict management skills CORE COMPETENCIES: PROFICIENCY LEVEL

You will also coach and create a vision for the team, provide subject matter training for your focus areas, motivate and inspire team members through effective and timely feedback and recognition for high performance.  You would be a key contributor in creating thought leadership within the area of technology specialization and in compliance with guidelines, policies and norms of Infosys. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! column2: At IBM, our Project Managers excel by leading and coordinating a project team's overall performance, scope, cost, and deliverables. Our clients rely on timely and efficient status reports, and as Project Manager, you will drive the charge with project direction, metric definition, and performance management. Your Role and Responsibilities Who you are At IBM, our Project Managers excel by leading and coordinating a project team's overall performance, scope, cost, and deliverables. Our clients rely on timely and efficient status reports, and as Project Manager, you will drive the charge with project direction, metric definition, and performance management. If you are ready to help our clients and project teams succeed, we would love to meet you! What you'll do:  IBM's Purpose is to be essential to our clients, to the world and one another and we are confident that together as IBMers we will drive this purpose. When you join IBM you join a culture of openness, teamwork, trust, and the invitation and expectation to have a voice. Join us and Do your Best Work Ever. We are recognized gold standard for inclusion, reflected in winning, to name a few, the 2018 Catalyst Award for advancing women in business, the National Award 'Best Employer of People with Disabilities' and being named one of the top 5 2018 Top Companies for Women Technologists for building an inclusive work environment - We advocate for fairness and equality as everyone is, and always has been, welcome at IBM. We at IBM Consulting are a dynamic group of Business, Strategy and Technology professionals - a specific source of best-in-class Industry Consulting, Application and Business process management, supported by the industry's most sophisticated outcome-based delivery model. All designed to be the Digital Reinvention partner for leading clients across the world - providing value-led and asset-powered end to end solutions. With a global footprint in over 170 countries, we are empowering clients to build upon their tremendous heritage in Application Innovation processes and also transform them to a Cloud, Cognitive and Social centric world. With skills across six sectors and 17 industries, all major service lines and competencies, IBM Consulting is a promising business unit in itself to be a part of. Through our unrivaled global delivery network; IBM offers global expertise coupled with a deep understanding of local capabilities, markets and cultures you could be part of and partner on some great projects with some of the best corporations in the world across geographies. How we'll help you grow: You'll have access to all the technical and management training courses you need to become the expert you want to be You'll learn directly from expert developers in the field; our team leads love to mentor You have the opportunity to work in many different areas to figure out what really excites you Required Technical and Professional Expertise 12+ years of Project Management experience with at least 2 of them being complex in nature Experience in leading end to end project delivery- across application development and maintenance Solid understanding of software development life cycle models as well as expert knowledge of both Agile and traditional project management principles and practices Good technical experience in Java, Angular, DevOps and open-source projects. Strong understanding of SDLC and Architecture. Should have managed large, complex fixed price projects with multi-function teams Financial management including budgets, forecasts, actuals, and variances Ability to lead teams and responsible for their development PMP Certified (Project Management Professional) Provide technical leadership and innovation across all aspects of technology development. Experience in handling India clients Preferred: Experience in at least 1 of the leading Hyperscalers.  Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise None

column2: Job Description: TechWish, is looking for an experienced Project Manager to join our team, leading projects in alignment with the US PMI practice. This position is crucial in establishing project management best practices and ensuring the successful delivery of various projects within our organization by adherence to organization and PMI standards. Key Responsibilities:   Lead and manage projects, ensuring adherence to PMI best practices and our organization's project management standards.  Develop comprehensive project plans, risk management strategies, communication strategies tailored to the specific needs of projects in India.  Work closely with delivery and practice leads, project managers, scrum masters, and business analysts across various engagements and establish effective collaboration.  Work closely with Project Managers across project engagements, providing guidance and support to maintain consistency in project management practices.  Foster a culture of knowledge sharing and learning from successful project experiences. Facilitate regular meetings or forums for Project Managers to discuss challenges, best practices, and lessons learned.  Establish and implement best practices, ensuring consistency and excellence throughout the organization.  Drive continuous improvement initiatives and uphold effective project governance across all projects.  Taking charge of end-to-end project management, you will be responsible for orchestrating seamless project execution, managing stakeholders, and facilitating collaborative knowledge-sharing sessions.  Should be a liaison between the delivery team, sales team, and leadership, ensuring project success and contributing to the organization's growth.  Report project progress, status, and key performance indicators to the relevant stakeholders. Requirements Required Qualifications and Skills:   A Minimum of 10 + years of experience in IT/Services organizations.   Should have managed and executed end to end projects.   Agile/Scrum methodology experience.  Masters or bachelors degree is a MUST.  Good understanding of Software technologies.   Should have QA and Audit experience.   PMP (Project Management Professional) certification from PMI is preferred.  Proven experience in project management, handling projects of varying complexities in a mid-size organization.  Strong understanding of PMI best practices and their application in project execution and control.  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with diverse teams and stakeholders in India and the US. Job Title: Project Manager Work Loaction: Madhapur, Hyd Work Timings:  2-11 PM IST or 3 PM - 12 am IST We are looking for resource to join our team  Immediately or within 15 days. Job description : We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Project Manager to lead our IBM MaximoTeams. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of managing complex projects Infrastructure and Application deployments. As a Project Manager, you will be responsible for planning, executing, and closing projects within established budgets and timelines.  Responsibilities for Project Manager:   Develop and maintain detailed project plans outlining tasks, timelines, and resource requirements.   Coordinate project activities, ensuring the alignment with organizational goals and objectives.   Execute project plans, monitor progress, and make adjustments as necessary to ensure successful project completion   Oversee the administration of Applications deployed, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.   Collaborate with technical teams to troubleshoot and resolve issues related to integration processes.   ??Ensure the security, availability, and performance of infrastructure components.  ??Communicate effectively with stakeholders to provide project updates, address concerns, and manage expectations.   Facilitate regular project status meetings and produce comprehensive project reports.   Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies.  ??Proactively address challenges to prevent project delays and ensure successful outcomes.   Manage project budgets, track expenditures and ensure financial goals are met.   Allocate resources efficiently and optimize team performance. Proven experience as a Project Manager, specifically in administration and infrastructure projects.   Understanding of Sterling Integrator and EDI technologies is a plus   Experience managing infrastructure teams and overseeing IT projects.   Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.   Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.

column1: Senior Project Manager - ETL/Data Warehouse /Data Engineering Projects
column2: As a Project Manager specializing in Delivering the   ETL/ Data Engineering/ Data Warehouse Projects , you will be responsible for overseeing the planning, execution, and delivery of data warehouse initiatives within our organization. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure that projects are completed on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards. Your role will involve managing project scope, resources, timelines, and risks while effectively communicating with stakeholders at all levels. Title : Sr Project Manager - Data Warehouse Projects management Experience Location : Remote Work Employment Type: Full-time No of Openings : 1 Work Timings : 2 PM to 11 PM IST Job Description : Lead the end-to-end project management lifecycle for  Azure Data Engineering projects,  from initiation to closure. Develop comprehensive  project plans, resource allocation strategies , and risk mitigation plans to ensure successful project outcomes. Plan and set up  Agile Ceremonies  - Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Retrospective, etc. Facilitate daily stand-ups, to monitor sprint progress. Strongly monitor and report the overall progress and effectively manage people utilization; take corrective action/steps whenever necessary. Communicate project progress, milestones, and key metrics effectively to stakeholders through written reports, presentations, and meetings. Identify and resolve project issues, conflicts, and dependencies in a proactive and timely manner, applying creative problem-solving techniques. Manage project budgets, track expenses, and provide regular status updates to stakeholders, including senior management and clients. Assign and oversee the daily tasks of technical personnel while ensuring all subordinates are actively working toward established milestones. Ability to understand the situation, the client's tone, and be able to reciprocate in the most appropriate and responsible way possible. Being Proactive - see it -flag it approaches, at any point when anything seems to be not going as per the plan and may impact the project in a negative way the PM should communicate it. Detail-oriented- Eye to details in terms of documentation, gathering client requirements. Supports a culture of continuous process improvement through sprint retrospectives and key indicators around team performance. Ensures clear communication and organization of all strategic and business delivery team goals. Required Skill sets: Proven experience as a Project Manager leading  ETL/ Data Engineering/ Data Warehouse Projects  in a corporate or consulting environment. Strong project management skills, including the ability to plan, organize, and prioritize multiple tasks effectively. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to influence and collaborate with stakeholders at all levels. Demonstrated leadership capabilities, with a track record of successfully leading cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time and within budget. Proficiency in project management tools/software (e.g., Microsoft Project, Jira, Trello) and Microsoft Office suite. Analytical mindset with problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt to changing priorities. Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies is a plus. A high level of EQ and IQ is necessary. Must have done  PMP/CSM/SAFE  certifications Excellent Verbal and Written Communication Skills. Lets give you more insights! column2: Family Description       Project Management (PM) comprises project management for execution of cross-functional / geographical projects and programmes from initiation to completion. Covers determination of project / programme goals and support of business objectives and strategies. Ensures projects / programmes achieve their targets, keep their schedule, and maintain estimated cost, time, and quality within planned scope. Covers management of risks that affect the delivery of project outcomes.       Subfamily Description       Internal Project Management (IPM) monitors and ensures projects for internal customers are delivered within agreed scope and are completed within budget, schedule, and quality standards. Covers implementation of process improvements to reduce development time and the assistance in the integration of complex business factors to develop and implement long-term strategic planning objectives.           Qualifications:       Bachelors degree in computer science, information technology, or related field.         ?       Experience:    15+ years of experience in IT project management, with a proven track record of successfully delivering technology projects in a complex environment.         ?       Certifications:    Project Management Professional (PMP) certification preferred.         ?       Skills:         Strong leadership and team management skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire project teams.     Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.     Proficiency in project management tools and methodologies, such as Agile, Scrum, or Waterfall.     Analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a keen attention to detail and a focus on delivering business value.         Additional Requirements:         Ability to adapt to changing priorities and work effectively in a fast-paced environment.     Experience with IT infrastructure, software development, or other technical domains preferred.     Flexibility to travel occasionally, as required by project needs.     Strong teamwork and collaboration skills, with a commitment to fostering a positive and inclusive work environment.     This job description serves as a guide to outline the key responsibilities, qualifications, and requirements for the IT Project Manager role within the organization. It may be customized further based on the specific needs and priorities of the organization.         Overview   : The IT Project Manager oversees the planning, execution, and completion of technology projects within the organization. This role requires strong leadership, communication, and technical skills to ensure that projects are delivered on time, within budget, and according to specifications.         ?       Responsibilities   :     ?       Project Planning and Execution:         Lead the planning, scheduling, and coordination of IT projects from initiation to closure.     Define project scope, objectives, and deliverables in collaboration with stakeholders.     Develop project plans, timelines, and resource allocation strategies to support project goals.         Stakeholder Management:         Establish and maintain relationships with project stakeholders, including clients, team members, and vendors.     Facilitate communication and collaboration between business stakeholders and technical teams to ensure alignment of objectives.     Manage stakeholder expectations and address concerns or issues in a timely and effective manner.         Resource Management:         Allocate resources, including personnel, budget, and materials, to support project activities.     Coordinate with departmental managers to secure resources and ensure adequate staffing for project teams.     Monitor resource utilization and adjust plans as needed to optimize project performance.         Risk Management:         Identify, assess, and mitigate project risks, proactively addressing potential issues to minimize their impact on project outcomes.     Develop risk management plans and strategies to mitigate project risks and ensure project success.     Monitor project risks throughout the project lifecycle and implement contingency plans as needed.         Quality Assurance:         Implement quality assurance processes to ensure that project deliverables meet or exceed quality standards.     Define quality metrics and performance measures to monitor project performance and identify areas for improvement.     Conduct regular reviews and inspections to verify compliance with project requirements and specifications.         Change Management:         Manage changes to project scope, schedule, and budget, assessing the impact on project objectives and stakeholders.     Facilitate change control processes, including impact analysis, stakeholder communication, and documentation updates.     Ensure that changes are properly documented, approved, and communicated to all relevant stakeholders.         Documentation and Reporting:         Maintain accurate project documentation, including project plans, status reports, and meeting minutes.     Provide regular updates and reports to project stakeholders, highlighting key achievements, risks, and issues.     Ensure that project documentation is organized, accessible, and archived according to organizational standards.
column11: Change management, PMP, Manager Quality Assurance, Team management, Project planning, Scheduling, Risk management, Resource management, Information technology

column2: About the job  Hi there  If you are reading this then you are on an exciting, daunting, fun, hard (or all combined) journey to find the perfect new career. We at Katzion don't think work is the most important part of your life, but let's be honest, we spend far too much time in it not to enjoy it. We make our hiring decisions based on experience, skills, and passion to make an impact. We don't expect individuals to be perfect, and we don't believe in unicorns - although that would be very cool. We also know that time is precious, so we better get into it, so we do not take up too much of yours. THE ROLE We are looking for a passionate Salesforce Project Managers to join our global team (7 offices) of rock stars and help take our organisation to the next level. You will manage the design, build and delivery of intelligent and robust solutions for Katzions clients. You will be accountable for the overall successful execution of a project or support contract from initiation through Go Live. You will lead functional and technical requirements sessions, act as a liaison between clients and Katzion's internal development staff, architect and document solutions, and develop interfaces between client side business and technology platforms and other systems. This role is both client facing and team leading. Our team is looking for a self-driven individual with a get it done mentality that has a passion for helping organisations solve complex business and technology problems.  Responsibilities  PROJECT MANAGEMENT ??Leverage the appropriate project delivery methodology (Agile/Waterfall) to manage project teams consisting of business and technical resources. ??Oversee multiple client projects through all phases of the project lifecycle (sales, planning, design, implementation, testing, deployment, and support) ??Manage, coordinate, and delegate work of project development teams ??Use your management and leadership capabilities to successfully execute project plans across multiple projects, developing and managing project timelines and governance plans, project schedules, design documents and success criteria, project milestones, reporting and budgets. ??Identify strategic and tactical opportunities to drive client value across multiple projects. ??Identify and manage cross project interdependencies. ??Act as point of escalation for project issues. ??Proactively identify potential at risk deliverables and intervene with remediate activity plans. ??Provide mentoring and coaching for project delivery team members. ??To support the interview and recruitment process for new team members ensuring fir to Katzion culture, work practices and appropriate skill profiles. ??Take responsibility for the risk profile across all projects within remit. ??Support pre/post sale processes and associated activities. ??Drive the initiative/project estimation processes.  PROJECT DELIVERY ??Translate client functional business requirements into a well-architected client solution, leveraging best practices and technology platform & products, and minimising the need for custom development. ??Propose, design, and implement solutions/upgrades, enhancements to solve client business needs ??Document client business requirements and ensure all have been satisfied through the implementation ??Demonstrate solution functionality to business stakeholders as needed ??Design and lead the execution of test plans and end-user acceptance testing to ensure a quality solution is delivered ??Present solution options to customer, evaluating the pros and cons of declarative configuration against code and customisation ??Participate in declarative system configuration of Salesforce Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, and http://Force.com solutions when necessary ??Participate in training content development and Administrator and end-user training delivery ??Conduct end user training for the solution and provide necessary implementation documentation ??Meaningfully contribute to the continual improvement of the Katzion delivery operating model . ??Work cross-functionally to determine the best resource utilisation plans to satisfy client solution objectives.  CUSTOMER LIAISON ??Work with clients to develop solution value propositions across multiple deliveries and projects. ??Support engagement managers business development objectives by taking operational level ownership for the development of repeat and new business opportunities with client base. ??Build and maintain trusted advisor relationships with new and existing clients. Collaborate with clients to analyse business requirements, design platform solutions, and manage projects. ??Effectively manage all aspects of projects and client communications including customer expectations, scope, timeline, resources, and budget through regular project status meetings with customers utilising project burn reports and status reports. ??Facilitate interactive design sessions with business and technical stakeholders to understand business processes and related functional and technical requirement detail.  SoW/SCOPE/CHANGE REQUESTS ??Ensure delivery per SOW, identifying deviations from requirements and assumptions and raise change orders as needed. ??Identify additional effort and incremental scope items, perform impact analysis for scope change requests, document changes to requirements, configuration, and data mapping, and create and discuss a plan for additional effort with customer (Change Request or Future Phase) ??Develop detailed implementation estimates and plans for all phases of the delivery lifecycle, including development, testing, training, communication, deployment, and post-production support  TEAM MANAGEMENT /R&D COLLABORATION ??Partner with our industry-leading team of Solutions Architects, Developers, and Technical Architects to solve complex problems and deliver best practice implementations and enhancements on the client business platforms. ??Assist in R&D capacity understanding the needs of the market and designing solutions to meet those needs. Work with the developers to build those solutions to take to market ??Manage the delivery team through the entire project lifecycle and track and report team progress against timelines and plans. ??Provide technical and functional expertise to project teams ??Coach and mentor project managers and functional team members ??Interview candidates for consulting roles SALESFORCE/INDUSTRY EXPERTISE ??Follow and understand new Salesforce product and technical capabilities resulting from product releases and acquisitions ??Participate in marketing events (e.g. sales meetings) ??Demonstrate thought leadership through publishing, public speaking and client presentations Qualifications ??4 to 6 years of experience with Salesforce implementations, defining business requirements, business process management and client relationship management required Required Skills/Experience   5 to 7 year of project management experience in a professional services or similar environment ??Demonstrate the ability to understand the operating styles of others as well as team/client relationships, team dynamics, and adjust behaviour accordingly to succeed. ??Adept at managing client expectations, leading development teams, and maintaining scope according to defined requirements. ??Demonstrated ability to plan, organise and execute all phases of a project lifecycle to ensure successful delivery. ??Experience supporting the development of business opportunities and pre/post sales processes. ??Proven track record of designing and optimising business processes and integrate business processes across disparate systems ??Excellent client-facing written and verbal communication skills ??Direct experience with Salesforce administration, configuration and management capabilities ??Ability to collaborate with client stakeholders to define requirements, goals, and set expectations on tasks that you and your team will be responsible for ??Expert level understanding of the Salesforce product suite, including Sales, Service, Community, and Marketing Clouds ??Salesforce Core Certifications preferred in two or more of these areas: Admin, Marketing Cloud, Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Community Cloud, Platform App Builder, Platform Developer I & II, Einstein Analytics, Tableau ??Additional certifications of value: Identity and Access Management Designer, Sharing and Visibility Designer, Application Architect, Integration Architecture Designer, System Architect, Technical Architect ??Expertise in Salesforce configuration, automations, process builder, and flow ??Experience leading design sessions with clients and documenting functional specifications, and developing user stories ??Strong propensity for innovative thinking balanced with disciplined rigor and following proven methodologies ??Knowledge of various stages of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) including analysis, process definition, requirement engineering, architecture design, development, enhancements, testing ??Experience defining detailed project scope and plans from business and technology objectives ??Ability to work closely with senior IT and business leaders to ensure that delivery expectations are developed, managed and met. ??Leading and directing all levels of project team members, including business and technology resources. ??Experience with a software development methodology, such as Agile or Waterfall.

Excellent interpersonal and organizational skills, ability to handle diverse situations, multiple initiatives and rapidly changing priorities. Ability to multi-task and prioritize and meet aggressive deadlines

column2: We are seeking an experienced individual to join our team as a Project Lead with a strong focus on architectural expertise. In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing and driving the successful delivery of projects, leveraging your architectural skills to ensure robust and scalable solutions. Utilize architectural expertise to design and implement high-quality solutions that align with project objectives and organizational goals.     Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and stakeholders, to define project requirements and specifications.     Provide technical leadership by guiding and mentoring team members, fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.     Conduct regular project reviews to assess progress, identify risks, and implement effective mitigation strategies. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage with both technical and non-technical stakeholders. column2: The IT Project Manager is accountable and responsible for driving strategic projects within the User Experience organization.      These projects are typically highly complex and require coordination across multiple departments within the User Experience organization. Key Competencies:          Knowledge of one or more IT Infrastructure domains - Networks, End User Computing, Global Support, Enterprise Computing      Preferably Engineering/Business Administration Degree with 12+ years IT experience      5+ Years of Project Management experience      Proven experience in stakeholder management & conflict resolution      Strong communication and negotiation skills. Good presentation skills      Flexible and capable to work in demanding environment.      Experience working with third party integrators.      PMP Certification      Financial acumen          Nice to Have:          ITIL V3 foundation certification      Knowledge of IT tools such as Power BI      Familiarity with cloud computing/edge clouds          Main Responsibilities:          Manages projects or sub projects independently ensuring timely delivery and good quality within the cost base line. Project size: typically, 1 to 2M      Plans and manages execution of the project or sub project according to agreed project targets. Leads project or sub project team.      Accountable for delivering the project scope and managing any deviations to the scope appropriately.      Manages time, quality, progress, cost, risks, and internal resources. Ensures customer satisfaction with delivery and implementation.      Performs risk mitigation and proposes corrective actions if not aligned with plans.      Manages change requests if needed.

column2: Job Description:   As a Project Manager in our organization, you will play a pivotal role in successfully delivering complex, multi-year projects within the dynamic and fast-paced Ecommerce domain. You will collaborate with various stakeholders, lead project teams, and ensure the timely and effective execution of projects using both Agile and Waterfall methodologies. Your expertise in project management, communication, and strategic thinking will be essential in achieving project goals and maximizing business outcomes. Key Responsibilities : Stakeholder Collaboration : Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including business owners, developers, designers, and QA teams, to understand project requirements, scope, and objectives. Project Planning : Develop comprehensive project plans, outlining phases, gates, resource allocation, and timelines. Choose appropriate project methodologies (Agile, Waterfall) based on project requirements. Team Leadership: Lead and motivate project teams, providing clear direction, setting expectations, and fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment. Risk Management : Identify potential risks and issues, developing mitigation strategies and contingency plans. Proactively address challenges to minimize disruptions to project timelines and deliverables. Work Tracking : Implement effective tracking mechanisms to monitor project progress, ensuring tasks are completed on time and within scope. Communication Management: Establish clear communication channels with stakeholders, providing regular updates on project status, milestones, and potential roadblocks. Dynamic Prioritization : Adapt to changing project priorities and business needs, making real-time adjustments to project plans and resource allocation. Methodology Expertise : Apply Agile methodologies for iterative and incremental project development, as well as Waterfall processes for structured project execution, ensuring the best-fit approach for each project. Required Skills and Qualifications : Project Management Expertise : Proven track record of successfully delivering complex projects in the Ecommerce domain, utilizing both Agile and Waterfall methodologies. Leadership : Strong leadership skills to guide and inspire cross-functional teams toward project success, fostering a collaborative and results-driven environment. Communication : Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively convey project updates, expectations, and progress to stakeholders at all levels. Problem Solving : Ability to anticipate challenges, think critically, and develop effective solutions to ensure project goals are achieved. Adaptability : Flexibility to thrive in a dynamic environment, adept at adjusting project plans and strategies to align with evolving business priorities. Time Management : Exceptional organizational skills to manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring all are progressing according to plan. Technical Acumen : Familiarity with Ecommerce platforms, technologies, and trends to facilitate informed discussions with technical team members. Risk Management : Proficiency in identifying, assessing, and mitigating project risks to minimize potential negative impacts. Certifications: Project Management Professional (PMP), Certified ScrumMaster (CSM), or other relevant certifications are a plus. Good To have : Cloud technologies, Design Patterns, Middleware technologies   Benefits TechBlocks is proud to provide all employees with comprehensive benefits that include a flexible work environment, casual dress code, full extended health benefits, paid sick time, paid vacation time, company-paid training and education support, industry-leading salary with bonus opportunities, financial allowances, and company-paid events and outings.

column2: At IBM, our Project Managers excel by leading and coordinating a project team's overall performance, scope, cost, and deliverables. Our clients rely on timely and efficient status reports, and as Project Manager, you will drive the charge with project direction, metric definition, and performance management. If you are ready to help our clients and project teams succeed, we would love to meet you! IBM's Purpose is to be essential to our clients, to the world and one another and we are confident that together as IBMers we will drive this purpose. When you join IBM you join a culture of openness, teamwork, trust, and the invitation and expectation to have a voice. Join us and Do your Best Work Ever. Your Role and Responsibilities A Technology Advisor, who not only understand the technology but how it affects their area of the business; trends associated with the technology; functional area and industries and the value propositions for clients to rotate to the new Individuals how have a desire to be client-facing and develop a career that involves being at the forefront in communicating to C-suite individuals about how SAP can help them achieve their strategic initiatives Your primary responsibilities include: You will work closely with our clients and demonstrate professional knowledge to ensure that the work products and delivery are of the highest level to ensure client satisfaction. Handle the designated project through all relevant stages of the systems lifecycle from project initiation through to project closure and review Lead complex projects, effective resource planning, technical leadership and management. column2: Datamatics, a global Digital Solutions, Technology, and BPM Company, provides intelligent solutions for data-driven businesses to increase productivity and enhance the customer experience. Datamatics services global customers across Banking, Financial Services, Insurance, Healthcare, Manufacturing, International Organizations, and Media & Publishing. The Company has a presence across 4 continents with major delivery centers in the USA, India, and Philippines. Job Role - Project Manager / Technical Project Manager  Experience - 18+ Years Location - Mumbai & Bangalore Role & responsibilities   Hands on attitude when mentoring/helping other team members  Exposure to software development especially Web and Mobile  Design software high level as well as detailed design  Interact with customers, gather requirements and take over as a Scrum Master  Take on all challenges of productization and project management; lead the dev team with example  Responsible for delivery deadlines  Responsible for estimating new proposals  Suggests smart technical solutions to meet client requirements efficiently  Consistently delivers high-quality services to our clients  Champion a responsive and stack-agnostic approach to modern software development. Very strong analytical skills and problem solving ability.  Very good oral and written communication skills.  Knowledge on cloud services.  Experience on monitoring servers will be an added advantage.   Should have following professional qualities: Leadership Achieves excellence in all areas of business. Client Management Communicates effectively with clients to identify needs and evaluate alternative technical solutions and strategies. Continually defines ways to increase customer satisfaction and deepen client relationships.    Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise PMP Certified (Project Management Professional) Experience in onsite-offshore delivery model,  offerings, staying relevant and in sync with market changes and innovations Tried work in full life-cycle implementations and validated project management capability required  Note -  We are looking candidates from Software Development background. column2: We are looking for an experienced Technical Project Manager with a proven track record in Data Analytics, possessing a minimum of 13 to 15 years of experience in leading and delivering complex projects       The ideal candidate should have exceptional communication skills, a deep understanding of Agile methodologies, and a strong background in managing cross-functional teams in data analytics projects     As a Technical Project Manager, you will play a critical role in overseeing the planning, execution, and successful delivery of data analytics initiatives while leading a team of 15+ skilled resources             Key Responsibilities:                   Lead the end-to-end planning, coordination, and execution of data analytics projects, ensuring adherence to project scope, timelines, and quality standards.                 Utilize your extensive experience in data analytics to guide the team in defining project requirements, objectives, and success criteria.                 Apply Agile methodologies to create and maintain detailed project plans, sprint schedules, and resource allocation, facilitating efficient project delivery.                 Manage a team of 15+ technical resources, fostering collaboration, communication, and a culture of continuous improvement.                 Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders, including data scientists, analysts, engineers, and business leaders, to align project goals with business objectives.                 Monitor project progress, identifying potential risks, issues, and bottlenecks. Implement mitigation strategies to keep projects on track.                 Use your excellent communication skills to provide regular project updates to executive leadership, stakeholders, and project teams.                 Apply Agile principles to facilitate daily stand-ups, sprint planning, backlog grooming, and retrospective meetings, promoting transparency and efficiency.                 Drive the implementation of best practices for data analytics, ensuring data quality, accuracy, and compliance with industry standards.                 Act as a point of escalation for project-related challenges, working with the team to resolve issues promptly and maintain project momentum.                 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful project delivery, including testing, deployment, and documentation.                 Provide input to project estimation, resource planning, and risk management activities.                   Mandatory Experience                   Technical Project Manager experience of minimum 5+ years for driving project management activities in the Data lake and Data warehousing (DW)                 Strong understanding of DW process execution from acquiring data from source system to visualization                   Exposure to Azure skills - Azure ADF, Azure Databricks, Synapse, SQL, PowerBI for minimum 3+ years    or Must have experience in managing at least 2 end to end on Azure Cloud projects                       Other Qualifications                   Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.                 A minimum of 13 to 15 years of progressive experience in technical project management, with a focus on data analytics and data-driven initiatives.                 In-depth knowledge of data analytics concepts, tools, and technologies, including data warehousing, data modeling, data visualization, and machine learning.                 Exceptional leadership and team management skills, with the ability to inspire, mentor, and guide technical professionals.                 Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the capacity to collaborate effectively across technical and non-technical teams.                 Demonstrated success in delivering data analytics projects on time, within scope, and meeting or exceeding quality expectations.                 Strong problem-solving skills, with a proactive attitude towards identifying challenges and finding creative solutions.                 Project management certifications such as PMP, PMI-ACP, CSM would be added advantage                 Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, managing multiple projects simultaneously.
