Builds and manages the relationship with key stakeholders  customer, supplier and in Rackspace. Maintains commercial responsibility for the project whilst building relationships with the customer to identify new opportunities to help them with their business problems. Unites and provides direction to internal and external technical and non-technical teams in order to ensure that all targets and requirements are met. Delivers results ensuring technical projects are completed on schedule and within budget.   JOB REQUIREMENTS: Key Accountabilities General   ??Engage Rackspace and client stakeholders in gathering and documenting requirements that solve a customers pain point or objectives through project outcomes and benefits realization. ??Manage project profitability, revenue, margins and utilization by pro-active forecasting and escalating any potential scope change / new revenue opportunities. ??Maintain commercial responsibility for the project whilst building relationships with the customer to identify new opportunities to help them with their business problems. ??Effectively manage resources whether directly or indirectly to achieve goals by enhancing trust and cooperation. Escalates any conflicting resource requirements that may affect delivery in a timely manner. ??Build and maintain a network of cross-functional technical resources within Rackspace and across any relative partnerships to allow for higher productivity, increased business, and rapid resolution of problems and escalations. ??Contribute to the refinement of the Rackspace Professional Services methodology. ??Provide FANATICAL EXPERIENCE by driving the value of Rackspace to both potential and existing Rackspace customers and internal sales teams alike. ??Ability to travel as required.   Project Management   ??Effectively leads, drives and executes projects using SCRUM methodology in order to achieve outcomes that meet the customer?? success criteria. ??Works effectively and communicates strongly with remote teams. ??Responsible for the scope, planning, monitoring and execution of technical projects from initiation through delivery, ensuring they remain on schedule and within budget, cost and quality tolerances.   ??Effectively communicates upwards to senior management and stakeholders as well as downwards to project team resources. Completes and adheres to RACI and holds people to account for their responsibilities. ??Accountable for the preparation of key project documents (PID, plans, logs, reports) and other key deliverables through the life of the project. ??Proactively works to identify and manage project risks and issues. Ensures appropriate response plans are developed and executed. ??Effectively manages change to the project baseline by assessing project variance and evaluating impacts supported by the use of rigorous change control processes. ??Monitors the delivery of project deliverables from third parties inside and external to Rackspace and tracks progress of same through communication with project members. ??Prepares and presents accurate reports on project progress and problems to Rackspace and client stakeholders.   Pre-Sales Engagement   ??Provides guidance for and assists with the creation of proposals, RFP/RFI responses, & Statements of Work (SoW). This includes the analysis and development of scope, duration, deliverables, resources, risk, assumptions and dependencies. ??Exhibits strong commercial acumen and calm gravitas when negotiating with customers or partners during contractual discussions ??Regularly collaborates with Sales pursuit teams, Programme & Project Managers, Technical Consultants, Solutions Architects, Partners, and extended cross-functional teams during presales and project delivery to ensure timely delivery and awareness of potential problems or risk requiring resolution or mitigation.   PERSON SPECIFICATION: Expertise / Qualifications   ??PMP/Prince2 (Practitioner) certification (minimum) ??Working knowledge/certification in one or more additional project management methodologies: PMP, PRINCE2, SCRUM, Agile, SAFe ??Proven ability to organise and execute projects in a consistent, repeatable and reliable manner. ??Technical conversational knowledge in the following areas: o Cloud Strategy & Enablement solutions o Data migration & consolidation o Application modernisation & optimisation o Cloud infrastructure optimisation o IT Service Management and Service Delivery (ITIL certification preferred) ??Excellent time management, communications, decision making, presentation, human relations and organization skills. ??Able to resolve problems in a timely manner. ??Ability to communicate technical information and ideas so others will understand. ??Excellent all round knowledge of cloud technologies, IT operations, project management operations. ??Ability to adapt to a rapidly changing environment. ??Adept at handling shifting priorities and ambiguity. ??Enterprise level use of MS Office suite and knowledge of other project management tools (JIRA, Confluence, Trello etc)   Experience   ??(essential) 7+ years project management experience in scoping, planning, leading and monitoring large scale, complex technical projects from initiation through delivery preferably in managed services or hosting. ??(essential) 5+ years working on technology projects including one or more of the following: o Virtualisation technologies / cloud platforms. o Application / platform migration. o Data / storage / network migration and/or management. ??(desired) previous experience of directly managing other PMs / technical resources

column2: This role will help ensure the Transformation function is executing WPP ITs vision, while professionalising how we mobilise and deliver projects as a service, ensure value focused approach, and benefits & cost control through tools that are fit for purpose      It will also play a crucial role in helping to establish a PPM community built on continuous learning, a support network, and a compelling career progression framework      It will be responsible for embedding a high-performing culture that has WPPs values at the heart of how it operates      It will have a strong focus on supporting the team to succeed            What youll be doing:          Part of a team of Project Management professionals [chapter] across sustains the wider PPM community, encompassing Programme and Project Management professionals in WPP IT, as well as those that may remain embedded within OpCos, the TMO organisation, or partially retain some PPM activities as part of other substantive roles      Part of a matrix team of PPM professionals, as well as business representatives, focusing on guiding and supporting them to deliver value for the business      Responsible for the mobilisation and delivery and active management of a project across WPP IT portfolio encompassing the E2E lifecycle - ie planning, resourcing, deliverables tracking, benefits and cost tracking and realisation, risks, issues, dependencies, assumptions, reporting, change, governance      Collaborates with a diverse multi-disciplinary global team to understand business needs and outcomes and works closely with key stakeholders across the company to deliver      Contributes to the continuous improvement of processes and procedures across the team and inputs into the overall framework with a focus on continually evolving best practices, tools and standards for mobilisation and delivery; ensuring that these are adopted universally across the delivery portfolio and continually improved      Supports senior PPM professionals, facilitates and collaborates with third parties, including strategic partners and highly skilled PPM contractors, to bring external best practice and improve alignment in ways of working across the wider PPM community      Inputs and professionally supports the wider team of Project Management practitioners, building and embedding a culture of continuous improvement and the learning journeys needed to build capability and technical expertise in the team      Supports and participates in people leadership activities for the Projects they lead, ie hiring, developing, input into performance evaluation      Actively sponsor and champion the shift to agile methodologies, in line with broader IT Transformation ambition and agenda, supporting teams as we continually look to improve flow      Within this role you will form part of the PPM practitioners pool and will be allocated to future projects to support your development and business needs          What youll need:            Proven track record of successful mobilisation and delivery of ambitious, strategic, and operationally complex project with internal and external cross-functional teams      Experience as a people leader and influencer with motivational and engagement skills including the ability to lead globally dispersed teams throughout all levels of the organisation.      Quick to learn and adaptable to changing priorities, with the ability to reshape, reconfigure and realign solutions to meet challenging deadlines without jeopardising the successful delivery of the programme      Ability to build and maintain relationships by engaging and working inclusively to establish credibility, solve problems, build consensus, and achieve objectives      A self-started with impeccable organisational and time management skills, focusing on value and outcomes; enthusiastic with a can-do attitude      Strategic and critical thinker - blending technical, operational and commercial strategic considerations into decision making, while continuously challenging the status-quo      Story telling with data - strong skills in building the case for change, identifying the business outcomes, value proposition for the respective area      Brilliant communicator - strong communication and stakeholder management skills; able to turn complex technical messages into effective, succinct communications; ability to manage and influence stakeholders with competing priorities      Functional analysis skills to enable the capture and breakdown of well-formed requirements and priorities      Experience in project management tools & dashboards      Experience in delivery methodologies (e.g. SAFe, Scrum, waterfall)      Experience working in an Agile team is beneficial      Recognised Agile or Project management certifications are beneficial      Experience in IT Service Management or Infrastructure projects

column2: IT Project Manager, you will be helping to deliver a brand-new data hub project, made up of new methods such as Data Ingestion, Data Standardization, Validation, Master Data Management and a new reporting environment through to completion!             Required that you have:       Bachelors degree required, or equivalent work experience.     Minimum 5 years experience working in a technical project management capacity, managing multiple Technology Infrastructure projects. Preference will be given to candidates who have experience managing projects in one or more of the following technologies: DevOps, cloud, or End User Productivity and Collaboration applications     Scrum Master experience is strongly preferred, as is experience using an Agile project management tool (such as Jira)     Experience in change management     Knowledge and application of both theoretical and practical aspects of project management, including various project management tools and techniques     Proficient in leading projects or project steps and communicating progress/approach with peers/clients.     The Senior Project Manager - Infrastructure (Azure) will manage several projects within the Infrastructure Technology portfolio, using waterfall and Agile techniques to meet project goals. The PM will use their technical experience to lead projects to modernize infrastructure. You will collaborate with project team members to overcome obstacles and engage with multiple partners and third parties to ensure the project delivers the desired outcomes         Take accountability for delivering projects on time, on budget, within defined scope, and with agreed-upon specifications to allow the achievement of defined benefits and project success metrics     Ensure project processes and artifacts are applied, including project charter, project plans schedules, project gating, issue risk management, financial management, resourcing, and procurement management     Maintain a high level of project communications through meeting minutes, status reporting (including accurate financial information), and proactive interaction with sponsors, project team members, and partners     Through demonstrated leadership, creates a team environment that promotes high performance and achieves a high degree of client satisfaction     Contribute to the success of the Infrastructure Project Delivery team by advocating for continuous improvement programs and providing guidance to less experienced project managers. Apply lessons learned to resolve current project issues. You will report to the Manager Portfolio Management     Importantly, training and upskilling    in Azure DevOps Jira      ITSM         PMP required

Maintain 80% billable utilization across assigned clients.                                 Identifies and manages risk proactively.                                 Extensive experience with Relativity front end tasks and capabilities.                                 Can easily provide client trainings, demos and make recommendations on how best to utilize the tool.                                 Acts as a point of escalation on project issues; works with Sr. Project Managers and/or Team Lead and appropriate internal teams to assesses, identify root cause, and manage messaging to the client.                                 Leads project meetings internally, with the client and/or outside counsel to keep project tasks and deadlines on track. This includes but is not limited to Project Kick off calls, training sessions, meetings clarifying project requests and issue identification/follow-up.                                 Continually seeks opportunities to increase customer satisfaction and strengthen client relationships. Participates in the continuous improvement of UnitedLex Project and Program Management methodologies and processes.                                 Sound understanding of technical products and services in the market, including forward-looking understanding of industry trends and new technologies.                                 Aware of competitors products and their strong and weak points.                                 Participation in training curriculum build and conduct formal training sessions on tasks handled by project management.                                 Work closely with offshore team; train them on client specific nuances so that they can aid in handling requests.                                 Compliance with time entry guidelines and deadlines required.                                   Qualifications                                   3-5 years experience as a PM in the Litigation Support industry.                                 Fully understands the eDiscovery market, competitor structures as well as the EDRM and applies this knowledge to their day-to-day interactions with clients, outside counsel and review providers.                                 Consultative expertise in managing eDiscovery projects.                                 Significant experience with Relativity; ability to conduct training sessions, navigate the platform easily and troubleshoot front end issues.                                 Full understanding of all industry standard technologies, challenges, and benefits. Comfortable speaking of these technologies to clients and strategizing on the appropriate approach for                                 Proactive client/relationship management and risk identification.                                 Excellent written and verbal communication skills.                                 Excellent planning and organizational skills.                                 Advanced abilities in MS Office suite, specifically MS Excel for complex reporting purposes.

column2: Project Role : Scrum Master Project Role Description : Acts as an enabler for the effective functioning of a software development team using Agile methodologies. Coaches and mentors the Scrum Team(s), removing barriers to successful implementation and enabling a continued focus on the task at hand. Facilitates scrum and agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives. Identifies and reports progress via appropriate metrics.  Must have skills : Agile Project Management Good to have skills : no Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BE Summary :As a Scrum Master, you will be responsible for enabling the effective functioning of a software development team using Agile methodologies. Your typical day will involve coaching and mentoring the Scrum Team(s), facilitating scrum and agile ceremonies, and identifying and reporting progress via appropriate metrics.  Roles & Responsibilities: Coach and mentor the Scrum Team(s), removing barriers to successful implementation and enabling a continued focus on the task at hand. Facilitate scrum and agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives. Identify and report progress via appropriate metrics, ensuring transparency and visibility to stakeholders. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, applying expertise in Agile methodologies to drive continuous improvement and delivery excellence. Provide guidance and support to the Product Owner and Development Team, ensuring alignment with the product vision and goals. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Strong experience in Agile Project Management. Good To Have Skills:Experience in Scrum Master role, Agile certifications such as CSM, PSM, or PMI-ACP. Solid understanding of Agile methodologies and frameworks, including Scrum, Kanban, and Lean. Experience in facilitating Agile ceremonies and driving continuous improvement through retrospectives. Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Agile Project Management. The ideal candidate will possess Agile certifications such as CSM, PSM, or PMI-ACP. This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification BE

Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Agile Project Management. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful Agile solutions. This position is based at our Bengaluru office.

Maintaining Backup of Court Room hearing both virtually and physical in NAS in restricted/protected view. Maintenance, operation and support for Audio-video systems including both hardware & software capabilities of NFRA. Monitoring networking activities & maintain of existing equipment & collaborate with 3rd party support & service menders to make network operational and perform all the duties of Network & Computer systems administrator.  Any other work assigned by senior officers. Experience 10-12 years Professional Qualification Graduate in Computer Science/Electronics/IT. Experience in Languages Java-j2EE, MySQL Experience in Platform/Database PostGreSQL, MySQL Relevant Functional/ Domain Expertise Interoperability About NFRA:     Are you a Chartered Accountant or an IT professional with a passion for contributing to the nation's financial integrity and transparency? Here's a unique opportunity to be a part of the esteemed  National Financial Reporting Authority (NFRA) , an autonomous regulatory body functioning under the Ministry of Corporate Affairs. At NFRA, we are on a mission to uphold the highest standards of financial reporting and corporate governance, ensuring a robust and trustworthy financial ecosystem for India. Why NFRA?     1. Championing Financial Integrity:  NFRA plays a pivotal role in ensuring accurate and transparent financial reporting by setting and enforcing accounting and auditing standards. As a member of our team, you will actively contribute to maintaining the integrity of financial information, thereby fostering investor confidence and sustaining economic growth. 2. National Impact:  By joining NFRA, you become an integral part of the nation's journey towards better financial accountability. Your expertise will directly influence policy decisions and shape the landscape of financial reporting practices in India, making a lasting impact on the economy and the business community. 3. Collaborative Environment:  At NFRA, you will collaborate with a diverse team of professionals, including experienced Chartered Accountants and IT experts. This environment encourages cross-functional learning and fosters innovation, creating a platform for you to expand your skill set. 4. Public Service:  Working with NFRA goes beyond a regular job it's a contribution to the betterment of society. As a government entity, NFRA's work is dedicated to upholding the principles of accountability and transparency, playing a crucial role in shaping ethical business practices. If you are driven by a passion for excellence, an eagerness to contribute to the nation's financial stability, and a commitment to upholding the highest ethical standards, NFRA welcomes you. Be a part of a dynamic team that is at the forefront of shaping India's financial landscape. Empower financial reporting. Build a stronger economy. Join NFRA today.   *A personal interaction/interview or presentation will be conducted for all candidates

column2: We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Scrum Master to join our digital project team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for facilitating the agile development process, ensuring the team adheres to Scrum principles, and removing impediments to progress. The Scrum Master will collaborate closely with product owners, development teams, and stakeholders to deliver high-quality digital solutions efficiently and effectively.     Responsibilities:     1. Facilitate Scrum Events: Lead daily stand-up meetings, sprint planning, sprint reviews, and sprint retrospectives to ensure clear communication, alignment, and progress tracking.     2. Coach and Mentor: Guide the development team and product owner on Scrum practices and principles, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and agility.     3. Remove Impediments: Identify and remove obstacles that hinder the teams progress, escalating issues when necessary to ensure timely resolution.     4. Shield the Team: Protect the team from external interference and distractions, allowing them to focus on delivering value during sprints.     5. Facilitate Decision Making: Assist the team in making informed decisions, encouraging collaboration and consensus-building among team members.     6. Promote Transparency: Ensure transparency by maintaining and updating agile artifacts such as the product backlog, sprint backlog, and burndown charts, providing visibility into the teams progress and priorities.     7. Collaborate with Stakeholders: Work closely with product owners, business stakeholders, and other teams to prioritize and deliver features that meet business objectives and customer needs.     8. Continuous Improvement: Drive continuous improvement initiatives within the team and across the organization, fostering a culture of learning, experimentation, and innovation.     9. Metrics Tracking: Track key performance metrics such as velocity, sprint burndown, and cycle time, using data-driven insights to optimize team performance and delivery outcomes.     10. Team Empowerment: Empower the team to self-organize and make decisions collaboratively, fostering a culture of autonomy, accountability, and ownership.     Qualifications:     Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.   Certified Scrum Master (CSM) or equivalent certification preferred.   Experience with agile tools such as Jira, Confluence, or similar tools.   Proven experience as a Scrum Master in digital projects, preferably in an agile software development environment.   Strong understanding of agile principles, practices, and methodologies.   Excellent communication, facilitation, and interpersonal skills.   Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with stakeholders at all levels.       Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution skills.   Knowledge of software development lifecycle (SDLC) and software engineering best practices.   Ability to adapt and thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
column11: Interpersonal skills, Conflict resolution, Project management, Agile development, Software development life cycle, Scrum, JIRA, Continuous improvement, SDLC

column2: JOB TITLE:  ERP Project Manager  REPORTS TO TITLE:  Head of IT Systems  LOCATION:  Noida or Bengaluru Offices ROLE PURPOSE : We are seeking an experienced Agile ERP Project Manager to oversee the Business as Usual (BAU) of our Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system (Unit4 & Thesis). The Project Manager will be responsible for leading BAU teams, coordinating support activities, managing timelines and budgets, and ensuring successful delivery of the ERP support. The Project Manager will be responsible for driving the project forward using Agile methodologies, ensuring collaboration, adaptability, and iterative development to deliver business value efficiently. ROLE and RESPONSIBILITIES : Coordinate BAU activities and allocate resources effectively to ensure timely completion using Agile methodologies. Lead the ERP project using Agile methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban, adapting processes to suit project needs. Facilitate Agile ceremonies including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives. Empower and support cross-functional Agile teams to deliver high-quality ERP solutions iteratively. Break down project deliverables into manageable user stories and tasks, prioritizing them based on business value and dependencies. Coach team members on Agile principles, practices, and tools to enhance productivity and effectiveness. Use Azure DevOps Board to track and deliver sprint-based delivery. Monitor project progress, identify risks, and implement mitigation strategies to keep the BAU delivery on track. Ensure adherence to project scope, budget, and quality standards. Collaborate with key stakeholders to gather requirements, define project objectives, and gain alignment on BAU scope. Communicate project status, milestones, and risks to stakeholders regularly. Manage stakeholder expectations and resolve conflicts as needed. Provide direction, guidance, and support to team members to ensure clarity of objectives and alignment with project goals. Identify potential risks and issues that may impact project delivery. Develop risk mitigation plans and strategies to address identified risks. Proactively monitor and manage risks throughout the project lifecycle. Develop and execute change management strategies to facilitate adoption of the ERP system. Engage with end-users to understand their needs and concerns and address them effectively. Provide training and support to users to ensure smooth transition to the new ERP system. Maintain the Release site with the delivery plans and release notes, documentations.  Establish quality standards and metrics for the ERP project. Conduct regular quality reviews and audits to ensure compliance with standards and requirements. Implement corrective actions as needed to address quality issues and improve project outcomes. Requirement Candidate with Agile Certification will be preferred. Proven experience managing ERP implementation or support projects, preferably with ERP, HCM and Student Management Systems Strong project management skills, including budgeting, scheduling, and resource management. Excellent leadership and communication skills, with the ability to effectively engage and influence stakeholders at all levels. Certification in project management (e.g., PMP, PRINCE2) is a plus. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, adapting quickly to change and driving continuous improvement.

S/he is involved early in the pre-sales cycle through implementation and customer sign-off. This position requires a strong technical background, excellent client and project management skills, proven ability to perform hands on technical work when needed, and ability to lead projects and global teams. What will you do?   Work independently or lead small technical teams with Azentio customers to evaluate their business processes and deliver the appropriate integration solution. This includes, but is not limited to, evaluating the customer's' content management and publishing processes, web application architecture, security requirements, DNS configurations, and provide detailed documentation for a custom solution that satisfies the customer's' business and technical requirements.  Work closely with customers and pre-sales teams to manage and implement customer trials, propose technically feasible solutions and set accurate expectations on effort and timelines for implementation. Identify new product features and additional sales opportunities during implementation and communication of the same to product development and sales teams. Track and document status and time spent on customer implementation.  Participate in internal projects that help scale the group, implement best practices, and improving our methodology and quality of implementations.  Review quality of customer Implementation.  Minimal travel to supported customer's offices when necessary (~10% travel). Strong written and verbal communication skills  Implementation experience delivering BFSI technologies in the Banking and NBFC space.   Project lead experience with a proven track record of successfully delivering projects for customers; experience working on and managing enterprise scale IT projects or equivalent experience.  A proven track record demonstrating good business judgment, an ability to make decisions, and passion for excellence.  Experience in a customer-facing role requiring high level of individual responsibility, sound business judgment and large enterprise account management, where an aptitude for improving customer satisfaction was successfully demonstrated. We  Give Back  to our communities through our business and our people.  We take  Pride  in all that we do and together we  Enjoy  the journey.

column2: About Wekan Enterprise Solutions Wekan Enterprise Solutions is a leading Technology Consulting company and a strategic investment partner of MongoDB. We help companies drive innovation in the cloud by adopting modern technology solutions that help them achieve their performance and availability requirements. With strong capabilities around Mobile, IOT and Cloud environments, we have an extensive track record helping Fortune 500 companies modernise their most critical legacy and on-premise applications, migrating them to the cloud and leveraging the most cutting-edge technologies. Job Description As a WeKan Technical Project Manager, you will be responsible for handling end-to-end delivery across groups of projects. In this role you will manage and work alongside teams of engineers to deliver high-quality software engineering engagements within the estimated timelines and budgets. The scope of your projects will range from overseeing Cloud migrations, Application modernisation and development and end-to-end transformation programs for companies ranging from high-growth startups disrupting their space, to large established enterprises operating in legacy environments. Roles & Responsibilities: Collaborate with customer and engineering teams to create engineering plans: resourcing, timelines, milestones, deliverables Identify and manage pre-requisites, dependencies, define and execute on critical path for project success Put in place status trackers, closely monitor advancements and ensure minimal deviation from target timelines and budgets Handle change management process, owning impact analysis and ensuring documentation is always up to date Identify areas of risk and put in place mitigation plans to ensure project stays in track Handle communication with customer including daily scrums, retrospectives, releases Manage customer expectations, escalations and ensure smooth delivery throughout product lifecycle Be a leader to engineering teams helping them navigate technical roadblocks, communication gaps Required Skills: Should have strong capability to organize work, assign tasks and resources prioritizing impact and value Should have strong communication, understanding skills and be able to manage customer expectations throughout engagement lifecycle Has deep understanding of agile methodology and hands-on experience running its ceremonies across multiple projects Experience running delivery for Enterprise customers including cloud-based application development, data migration projects (from on-prem to cloud or cloud-to-cloud) Understands digital transformation and application modernization programs Understand project estimation and can challenge engineering teams on suggested timelines Good to have: Previous experience as a software developer / testing engineer Understands cloud architecture, Dev-Ops and CI-CD process Certifications: PMP, Agile Certified Scrum Master, SAFE Agile

column2: Senior Project Manager : Job Description: We are looking for an experienced Senior Project Manager to lead our BI analytics, Data Warehousing (DWH), and new product development projects. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in these areas and a proven track record of successfully delivering complex projects on time and within budget. Responsibilities: Lead and manage BI analytics, DWH, and new product development projects from inception to completion. Organize and lead meetings with the customer team to gather requirements, understand business objectives, and discuss technical aspects of the project. Collaborate with stakeholders to define project scope and objectives. Dive deep into the customer's business model, key performance indicators (KPIs), and analytics needs. Identify and prioritize business use cases that align with the customer's strategic goals. Gain a thorough understanding of the customer's IT landscape, including existing systems, data sources, and infrastructure. Identify technical and non-functional requirements that need to be addressed in the proposed solution. Define project scope, goals, and deliverables that support business goals in collaboration with senior management and stakeholders. Develop comprehensive project plans that encompass all project details, including timelines, resources, budget, and risk management strategies. Use agile and waterfall methods as appropriate for project needs. Perform resource planning, including identifying and securing resources, defining roles and responsibilities, and managing resource allocation to ensure project deadlines are met. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including QA, development, and business stakeholders, to ensure project objectives are met. Provide guidance and support to team members to help them achieve project goals. Identify, assess, and mitigate project risks. Develop contingency plans as needed to ensure project success. Track project progress against milestones and deliverables. Use project management tools to monitor and report on project status to stakeholders. Provide regular project updates to stakeholders, including progress reports, risk assessments, and recommendations for project improvement. Ensure project deliverables meet quality standards and are aligned with business requirements. Ensure thoroughness of testing and validation of deliverables before release. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business Administration, or related field; Master's degree preferred. 10+ years of experience in leading BI analytics, DWH, and new product development projects. Strong understanding of technology and architecture, with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions. Proven track recordof successfully delivering projects on time and within budget. Self-starter with th e ability to work successfully in a team environment with drive. Experience with agile and waterfall project management methodologies. Excellent communication and leadership skills, with the ability to manage cross-functional teams effectively. Project Management Professional (PMP) certification preferred. Certified Scrum Master (CSM) certification preferred. Strong written and verbal communication skills. Detail-oriented with a high level of accuracy. Committed to the values of integrity, accountability, and customer centric
column11: Business Intelligence, Data Warehousing, DWBI

column2: Experience Required: 8+ years Location: Pune (Preferred), Chennai, Bengaluru 5 days working Mondat-Friday Work from office:9am-6 pm Who You Are: You are a visionary leader with a robust technical background in Microsoft .Net and related technologies, eager to shape the future of fintech solutions. With a harmonious blend of project management expertise and profound technical knowledge, you stand ready to guide teams, mentor emerging talent, and spearhead innovative projects from their inception through to their triumphant realization. Your Role: - Lead and Innovate: Direct the planning, execution, and delivery of complex Microsoft .Net projects, guaranteeing high-quality results within budget, scope, and timeline constraints. - Foster Growth: Create an engaging and cohesive work environment, mentoring team members to unlock their full potential. - Mitigate Risks: Proactively identify project risks and formulate effective mitigation strategies, maintaining transparent communication with all stakeholders. - Ensure Excellence: Uphold process adherence by leveraging industry best practices and standards in software development and delivery. - Develop Talent: Supervise, coach, and cultivate your team, ensuring alignment with performance appraisal processes and fostering professional growth. - Embrace Technology: Drive strategic leadership in the adoption of new technologies, especially AI, to innovate and disrupt within the financial sector. Desired/Recommended Technical Competencies & Skills: - .NET Core Mastery: Strong hands-on expertise in .NET Core, showcasing deep knowledge and experience in building robust, scalable applications. - Software Development Best Practices: Proficient in writing clean, maintainable code, with extensive experience in ORM, JSON, and multi-threading, ensuring high performance and scalability. - API Design and Development: Skilled in developing both RESTful and GraphQL APIs, understanding the nuances of creating highly accessible and efficient web services. - Microservices and Event-Driven Architecture: Experienced with designing and implementing microservices architectures, utilizing event-driven patterns for dynamic and responsive applications. - Containerization and Orchestration: Proficient in containerization technologies like Docker, and orchestration with Kubernetes, including service discovery and service mesh, to manage complex, scalable microservices landscapes. - Cloud Platforms: Expertise in cloud environments such as AWS/Azure, leveraging cloud services for enhanced application performance, scalability, and reliability. - Database Management: Expertise with RDBMS and NoSQL databases, understanding their application within .NET environments for optimal data storage, retrieval, and manipulation strategies. - DevOps Practices: Comprehensive understanding of DevOps practices including continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) using tools like Jenkins, and version control systems like Git, integrated within Jira for project management and Maven for dependency management. - Security Practices: Awareness of security best practices and common vulnerabilities specific to .NET development, implementing secure coding techniques to protect data and applications. - Monitoring and Logging: Adept at using tools for application monitoring, logging, and distributed tracing, ensuring high availability and identifying issues proactively. - Leadership and Communication: Exceptional leadership, communication, and project management abilities to lead diverse and geographically dispersed teams. What We Offer: - Impactful Work: A pivotal role within our innovation team, making a significant impact on financial accessibility and sustainability globally. Projects you lead will directly contribute to enhancing the financial infrastructure, with a focus on inclusivity and sustainability. - Growth Opportunities: Continuous learning, career advancement, and hands-on experience with cutting-edge projects. - Recognition and Reward: A culture that celebrates your dedication and innovative contributions with comprehensive benefits, flexible schedules, relocation support, and opportunities for international exposure. Benefits We Offer: - Flexibility for Work-Life Harmony:Find balance with flexible schedules that prioritize your well-being. - Relocation Support & Global Opportunities:Seamlessly transition with relocation support and explore international opportunities. - Rewarding Performance:Performance-based bonuses and annual rewards recognize your dedication. - Comprehensive Well-being:Comprehensive benefits including Provident Fund and health insurance ensure your peace of mind.

column2: What youll do?   In this role, you will work closely with the technology, data science and product  management teams to deliver high quality, scalable products:  You will collaborate with the Product team to deliver the best product with most efficient use of resources and technologies.  You will work with the Technology and Data Science teams on resourcing, blockers  and a focus on end-to-end planning.  You will work with all the stakeholders to assemble project teams, assign  responsibilities, identify appropriate resources needed, and develop schedules to ensure timely completion of key projects by meeting project milestones.   You will collaborate with management on key project budgeting including costing and resourcing.  You will also assess risks, anticipate bottlenecks, provide escalation management,  make trade-offs, balance the business needs versus technical constraints and  encourage risk taking behavior to maximize business benefit.  Successful candidates will have a technical background, be detail driven and have excellent  problem-solving abilities. You should not only be passionate about delivering extensible, ontime solutions, but should also be obsessed with contributing to the development of highperformance teams through rigorous goal setting, disciplined attention to performance  metrics, continuous process improvement, and mentorship.  Lead and manage Agile project teams, utilizing Scrum principles to deliver projects on  time and within budget. Facilitate Scrum events such as daily stand-ups, sprint planning, sprint reviews, and retrospectives. Coach, mentor, and guide teams on Agile practices, fostering a culture of continuous  improvement.   Collaborate with stakeholders to define project scope, goals, and deliverables. Identify and mitigate project risks, proactively resolving issues that may impact project delivery.  For Key projects, develop and maintain project plans and track and communicate  progress. Manage larger projects that span multiple sprints and deliver on endto-end business priorities. Stakeholder management will include internal teams  as well as external stakeholders like our partners and vendors.  You will collaborate with management on key project budgeting including costing and  resourcing. Foster a collaborative and productive team environment, promoting transparency and  accountability.  Utilize Agile metrics and tools to monitor team performance and project health. Continuously improve Agile processes and methodologies, incorporating best practices  into project workflows. The candidate will be suitably well versed with the appropriate information security responsibilities for the role and is responsible for adhering to them.  Who you need to be?   Bachelors degree in engineering  Scrum Master certification is mandatory.   PMP, PMI-ACP, or other Agile certifications are a plus.  Proven experience 3-5yrs leading multiple teams and managing cross-functional  projects   end-to-end.   Proven experience 2+ years as Scrum Master managing Agile/Scrum teams in Startups/  Mid-size organizations.   Practical application of Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, etc.).   Strong leadership and communication skills. Ability to influence and motivate teams.  Proficiency in project management tools (Jira is mandatory. Trello, Asana are a plus).  Ability to adapt to changing priorities and thrive in a fast-paced environment.   Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities.   Familiarity with OKRs framework is a plus.
column11: Sprint Planning, PMP, JIRA, Agile Methodology, Scrum, Sprint Review

column2: Job Description: As a data solution company we are seeking a skilled Project Manager with 3-5 years of experience in the field of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to join our dynamic team. The Project Manager will play a crucial role in leading AI/ML projects from conception to completion, ensuring timely delivery, and exceeding client expectations. The ideal candidate should possess strong organizational, communication, and leadership skills, along with a deep understanding of AI/ML technologies and methodologies. Key Responsibilities: Manage end-to-end project lifecycle for AI/ML initiatives, including planning, execution, monitoring, and delivery. Collaborate with cross-functional teams including data scientists, engineers, and business stakeholders to define project objectives, scope, and requirements. Develop detailed project plans, timelines, and budgets, ensuring alignment with client goals and expectations. Track project progress, identify risks and issues, and proactively implement mitigation strategies to ensure successful project outcomes. Communicate project status, updates, and milestones to internal teams and clients, ensuring transparency and alignment throughout the project lifecycle. Facilitate effective collaboration and communication between technical and non-technical stakeholders to drive consensus and achieve project objectives. Drive continuous improvement and optimization of project management processes, methodologies, and best practices within the AI/ML team.

You will be responsible and accountable for successful and on time    Implementation Project Manager | Clari5    Job Description    Implementation Project Manager for category- leading Banking Intelligence Product Company    We are looking for an experienced Implementation Project Manager who can lead,  manage and execute enterprise scale application implementation projects for our clients,  who are leading Banks,  in India and across other geographies.     You will be responsible and accountable for successful and on time delivery of the solution quality and consistency is a must!    You will work with our team and the client team to execute projects with the support of a strong project team of developers,  implementation engineers and QA analysts.     You are required to have a very good knowledge of Database (Oracle/  MS SQL) and Core Banking application,  and a strong background in project planning,  management and documentation.     Key Responsibilities    Work with our project team and the client team to define functional requirements and document solution design.     Specify and convey requirements for custom coding,  integrations,  and custom reports to the development team and assist QA with test cases for testing completed solutions.     Ensure successful integration of our application with the identified source system of the client,  including resolution of any issues.     Perform installation,  configuration,  integration,  testing,  training,  documentation for our application.     Keep track of the various stages/ milestones of the project life cycle.     Manage project scope,  timeline,  budget,  and project deliverables.     Implement efficient stakeholder and team management practices.     Get client sign off on completion of key milestones.     Required skills:    2+ years of leading any enterprise scale banking product implementation.     4+ years experience in product development /  Implementation,  end- user training,  design specification creation,  and system configuration    High level of professionalism and ability to complete a variety of project tasks in a timely and efficient manner    Proven skills in stakeholder management,  high level of collaboration.     Excellent verbal,  written and presentation skills    Personal qualities:    Self- motivated and results oriented.     Committed to high standards and continuous improvement.     Ability to take ownership and drive actions to closure.     Good mentor,  team player and contributor with excellent collaboration and interpersonal skills.     Education/ Qualification:    Graduates /  Post Graduates,  preferably in engineering from reputed institutions.     7- 12 years industry experience.  About Us:    Endorsed Best Fraud Detection Product by Risk. net and consistently featured in Chartis RiskTech Quadrants for anti- fraud technology,  CustomerXPs continues to redefine real- time,  cross- channel Banking Enterprise Fraud Management with its human brain like approach to fighting financial crime.  Harnessing the combined power of Automation,  Artificial Intelligence,  Decision Sciences and Real- time Decisions,  CustomerXPs real- time,  cross- channel product Clari5 processes over 10 bn transactions,  manages over 450 mn accounts and reliably secures 4% of the global population s banking transactions.  With 200 mn accounts at a single site,  Clari5 has the world s largest implementation of a fraud management solution.  Tier 1 banking customers across 15 countries who trust Clari5 for driving their fraud management strategy are recipients of global industry acclaim,  including Banking Technology s Best Use of IT in Risk Management/ Regulation and Celent s Model Bank of the Year. column2: Intellistride IoT business solutions are designed to be fully integrated offering our customer enhanced productivity, improved quality, efficient logistics processes and increased customer satisfaction.In order to ensure our customers are competitive, we accumulate Kathrein RFID expertise using the platform-independent SAP-certified software CrossTalk , created by our recently acquired company noFilis.      This enables us to use track and trace visualisation toseamlessly incorporate any identification technology - including open-standard options such as barcode readers and RFID labels - and generate interfaces with ERP and SCM systems.High-end hardware and customer-oriented service round off our portfolio. We provide RF simulation, application support, software integration and implementation as well as operation and maintenance - all from a single source     .The PositionIntellistride is looking for a Technical Project Manager to Execute IoT business in India market. Intellistride aims to provide end to end IoT Solutions to enterprises in the region.Technical Project Manager - IoT will have the responsibility of implementing and project managing solutions for Customers in India. Key priorities of the role will be as follows:Project Management IoT cases based on defined Solutions.      The Technical Project Manager works across Kathrein and non Kathrein RFID IoT product and services landscape and implements the solution on ground. The Solution could incorporate 3 rd Party products and devices which can be integrated onto Kathrein Cross talk IoT platform.Cost, Time and Quality management for the RFID/IoT projects: The Project Manager is responsible for managing the Project Cost , Time and Quality.      He is expected to manage the Risks for Project delivery and take adequate actions to mitigate the risks.Third party Partner Management : Technical Project Manager is expected to manage the third party suppliers and service providers contributing to the project.Understanding Customer Business needs: The position requires the person to understand current Customer processes and Business needs. The implemented solution should demonstrate considerable business improvement on financials and process efficiencies.     Documentation and Presentation to Customers:     ?The position requires the person to support the Management in Customer interface with presentation and Customer Project documentation. He will be required periodically to present the project progress to Management Leading/ Supporting POC/ Demo: The position will require supporting specificcustomer demo of Kathrein Products and running of Proof of Concept (POC) for solutions. The success criteria for the POC will need to be defined with the Customer.     Technical Project Manager will need to lead the technical changes that need to be done to make the POC a success.Interactions with Regional Solutions Team and Global Developmentteam: Technical Project manager will be responsible for working closely with Regional Solution Constant team in Bangalore India. The Technical Project Manager will be a member of this regional team for all technical development and Solution discussions.     The Technical Project Manager in the country is also expected to be working and providing inputs into global Developments of IoT Products. Partnerships and Vendor management and local testing: Kathrein philosophy is to incorporate devices from third party vendors onto the readers and Crosstalk software.This will require the Technical Project Manager to do local testing of tags, sensors and other devices and qualifying the quality of tags and devices including interworking with Kathrein platform.     Candidate requirements:      6-8 years of Strong Project management background in IoT/ RFID/ Software. Understanding of RF principles, networking and basics SW Application implementation. Good English speaking/ written communication absolutely critical as the candidate will be dealing with international customers and internal team. Good understanding of IoT Value chain, System Integration and Software Sales concepts. Deep HW SW technical and execution background in RFID,Sensors IoT Platform domain.      Capable of managing Project Management thru professional Project Management tools like MS Project etc. Good understanding of Customer Sales engagement process is essential. Experience on large complex IoT projects will be an added advantage. Additional business economics experience advantageous. Good market/ Competitive/ Partner knowledge in IoT space.      Open and free mind to determine and create solutions (technical creative person) Hands-on mentality Good office skills (PowerPoint, Excel, ...). Understanding of Crosstalk Software will be an advantage Experience in creating presentations and training schemes Preparedness to travel (within and outside India)

column2: A Senior Project Manager reports to a Program Manager. Works closely with Directors and Subject Matter Experts, designers, developers and QA to ensure flawless project execution, efficient resource allocation, project financial sanity and client satisfaction. He/She fosters and grows project management talent and helps to develop processes, documentation, standardization and tools. He/She is interested, invested and passionate about the industry, the clients we serve, and the work produced            In this role, you will:              Manages day to day activities in the Delivery Department to ensure projects meet organizational goals and requirements.              Promotes the Agile values and principles.              Analyzes the state of the Agile teams within the responsible projects to determine needs and opportunities for improvement of Agile practice.              Support on establishing effective Agile governance approaches - such as ticket descriptions, metrics, dashboards and reporting.              Manages projects and resources in charge.              Supports leadership for PMs to manage all phases of program to success, including initiation, planning, definition, design, development, testing and deployment cycles.              Drives weekly releases for vertical and/or horizontal; review and prioritization of work and resource planning.              Coordinates with Development and QA teams and communicates with all impacted Stakeholders.              Collaborates with IT technical teams to ensure successful delivery of projects.              Ensures all projects stay in scope and on schedule.              Partners with our AP team to drive cohesion around the customer experience and partner retention.              Supports Agency Partnership Director and New Business Development team to engage and win prospective clients.              Supports discipline leadership and guidance to the Delivery Department team, setting standards and working to ensure the overall success of this group within the organization.              Adheres to and advises on the company wide operating metric targets with the Group Delivery Director.              Responsible for ensuring its teams are developing and executing against detailed project plans, including overall budget allocations, schedule roll-ups of all projects, critical path and risk assessment.              Works with team leads and Program Manager to develop process and documentation standards for team to follow with the end goal of top-efficiency and quality.              Works with Group Delivery Director to align appropriate team members against suitable assignments, considering business needs and individual Career Paths.              Contributes to professional development plan of the Project Managers, through mentoring, coaching and training as per request from the Program Manager.              Evaluates teamwork, initiative, work ethic, values adherence.              Motivates people, works and leads in a team environment.              Ensures effective communication and promotes a sense of participation and involvement.              What are we looking forBesides a great attitude,              You should have:              5+ years of experience managing a variety of digital project types; site builds, ecommerce, marketing campaigns, microsites, maintenance.              A track record for successfully managing a discipline or large programs.              A mastery of Project Management Methodologies, PMI Process Groups, AGILE Development and Risk Management.              Expert experience in project finance, pipeline planning, forecasting, road mapping and leadership.              Resource management within the Solution Delivery team including balancing priorities, timelines, mix and casting while understanding and supporting the objectives and motivations of every discipline.              Proven ability to successfully manage multiple stakeholders.              Proven ability to work on large scale digital projects.              Proven ability to develop and implement processes to ensure high-quality deliverables for the client.              Proven acumen negotiation skills and proven ability to interact with Senior-level employees.              Presents him/herself in a polished, professional way. Very high degree of personal professionalism.              Mastery of office productivity tools such as Excel, Word, MS Project, Visio, and PowerPoint.              Mastery of collaboration and issue tracking tools such as Box, Jira, Confluence.              PMP designation, SCRUM Master, Six Sigma desired.              Competencies to be successful in this role:              Attention to Detail              Communication              Problem Solving

column2: Provide administrative support    The individual provides project administrative assistance. These activities will include,  but not limited to:    Project administration all administrative functions related to projects  Schedule management maintaining an up to date project schedule  Documentation and report preparation collating and preparing all project related documentation and reports  Meeting arrangement and documentation providing general administrative support,  co- ordination of meetings with a variety of stakeholders,  including vendors and managers and the booking of meeting rooms  Cost tracking assisting with the monitoring of cost related projects by tracking invoices and payments in relation to the project budget and monitoring costs against the budget  Resource allocation assisting with the allocation of project resources  Third party management -  co- ordinate the relationship with third parties for the delivery of resources and contractors when necessary. Manage project delivery   Under the guidance of a Project or Senior Project Manager,  the PS Project Co-  ordinator adheres to and ensures that the project delivers the as- sold solution,  remains within baselined budget and is delivered on time,  while achieving quality criteria and maintaining client satisfaction. This individual will manage delivery of the project according to the PMI knowledge areas and in line with Dimension Data s Primer methodology. This includes project scope control and management of change variations. They also communicate with key stakeholders regarding the status of their projects. Project set- up,  resources and operations are efficiently managed,  possibly with the assistance of the Project Administrator. The individual is able to liaise with clients and capable of managing several transactional engagements or standard/ co-  ordinated projects simultaneously. He/ she is able to co- ordinate the relationship with (third) parties for the delivery of resources and contractors when necessary. Behavioural skills The individual has a proactive approach,  pays attention to detail,  has good verbal   and written communication skills and has a client service orientation. PS Project Co-  ordinators demonstrate an understanding of the project environment and stakeholder interests. The PS Project Co- ordinator needs to have a fundamental understanding of business and project processes,  structures and control requirements. The individual has a   good understanding of project life cycles,  and takes responsibility for all aspects of the projects. This individual works towards the achievement of CAPM certification.    Key Roles and Responsibilities    In this position you will be required to:   1. Provide project administrative assistance to Project Managers,  the PML,  Programme Managers and project teams. 2. Manage delivery of the project according to the PMI knowledge areas and in line with Dimension Data s Primer methodology. 3. Ensure that the project delivers the as- sold solution,  while achieving quality criteria and maintaining client satisfaction. 4. Liaise with clients and ensure client satisfaction. column2: This role requires to work in US hours for the following reasons:                Should be willing to work in US hours until 11PM-12 am              Demand for Release Management support goes on throughout most of the day.              Requires working on weekends to lead the deployment of WST releases.              There are 1-2 daily Change Management Advisory Boards (AM and PM) that the Sr. Release Manager attends when the IT Director is unable to.                  Profile Summary:                  The release manager is responsible for managing the end to end lifecycle of a release by following the Clients Release Management process.              This process encompasses the planning, design, configuration, build, test and production implementation of hardware and software modifications from inception through post implementation verification.              Takes ownership and ensures coordination of all release activities with members of the Business, IT, and Project Management areas.                  Profile Description:                  Manage the life-cycle of a release for hardware and software modifications and new deployments by following the release management process as well as other core IT service management processes as needed, across multiple application suites.              Build a release roadmap to identify scope and timelines in collaboration with team members and leadership to plan execution minimizing/avoiding risk of collision with other changes/releases.              Meet monthly or quarterly with Business Leaders to review priorities for future work.              Document the full lifecycle of release in the service management tool by completing the major activities through each tollgate and acquiring required approvals from business stakeholders and project management, following and executing all IT service management processes as needed, throughout the release lifecycle.              Identify risks, manage interdependencies and timing concerns, to ensure milestone adherence and ensure that release integrity can be measured.              Coordinate efforts with other release managers and application suite managers, for large multidiscipline teams in a matrix management organization with tasks associated with the release scope, to confirm resource availability (escalate to senior leaders as appropriate for follow-up). The disciplines include operations, BA/BSA, QA, developers, project management, infrastructure, senior business & IT leaders, and supplier resources & leaders.              Create release plans and conduct release readiness -, milestone - and business go/no-go reviews with technical team, project managers and the business stakeholders to include release policies, milestones, test plan and success criteria.              Develop communication plans including scope and change control management with stakeholders and team members.              Communicate plan of execution and impact to CI asset owners affected by release. Communication and escalate issues related to the release plan, scope, schedule, implementation quality and final results of the executed release.              Provide metrics, release scorecard and reporting for all releases and escalates as appropriate.              Coordinate execution plan and monitor activities during the release implementation, ensuring technical support is available to assist technical resources before, during and after the installation, and that any production issues are identified, tracked and resolved during the post installation phase.              Adhere to SLA agreements and/or request approval for deviation from SLAs if it meets process policies and guidelines for such approvals.              Participate in post implementation review and continuing service improvement meetings.              Participate in CAB and release advisory meetings to review release and changes.              Other duties and projects as assigned.                  Knowledge & Experience                  Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related field.              4-8 years of release management experience or enterprise-wide project management              3-6 years of experience in application and hardware implementation              ITIL v3 Foundation certification preferred.              Detailed understanding of ITIL Release, Change and Configuration Management              Advanced knowledge of software development lifecycle.              Demonstrated effective leadership and critical thinking skills.              Very strong written and verbal communication skills              Strong Project management & organizational skills              Demonstrated ability to collaborate & ability to build relationships with various stakeholders in a matrixed environment              Proven record of flexibility and ability to adapt to changing priorities              Exposure and familiarity with automated testing tools, process management tools and change management              Experience with ServiceNow and analytics tools              Microsoft Office expert level knowledge of Excel and PowerPoint              Understanding of Clients Change management & Release management processes desired              Proven ability to solve problems /strong critical thinking skills

column2: EZ Outsourcing is seeking an experienced IT Professional with Project Management skills for the U.S. based client. The responsibilities will encompass troubleshooting, maintaining and managing a variety of IT systems, including an internal server, firewall, various desktops, laptops, and other related systems. The role requires excellent English communication skills to interact directly with the client.  You should be a proven, resourceful problem solver with the ability to research and implement solutions for IT problems that arise. Additionally, as a Project Manager, your role will involve coordinating with external vendors for projects requiring skills beyond your core expertise. You should be capable of comprehending business needs of the client, converting them into technical specifications, and meticulously validating the executed work for accuracy and precision. Support Clients IT needs by managing and troubleshooting a variety of IT systems. 2. Maintain and manage office systems, including but not limited to an internal server, firewall, desktops, and laptops. 3. Handle and resolve any IT-related issues that arise from time to time. 4. Manage IT projects, collaborating with external vendors, converting business needs into technical specifications, and ensuring the final output aligns with the set requirements. 5. Conduct rigorous quality checks on completed work to ascertain its correctness and accuracy. 6. Perform other business-related tasks as required Essential Skills & Experience: 1. A minimum of 10 years of proven experience in IT support, networking, and server management. 2. Minimum 5 years of experience in project management. 3. Experience in direct client interaction. 4. Demonstrated experience working with external vendors. 5. Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English. 6. Proven resourcefulness and problem-solving abilities, capable of researching solutions to IT issues. 7. A proactive team player who also thrives in an independent role, efficiently completing tasks. If you are a dedicated, resourceful IT professional with a proactive approach to tasks, substantial expertise in IT support, and project management, and enjoy working in a dynamic small business environment, we invite you to apply.

Team Building and Management:  - Assemble project teams, including developers, testers, and other relevant specialists. - Provide leadership and guidance to the project team, fostering a collaborative and high-performance work environment. - Manage project resources efficiently, optimizing team productivity.  5.  Technical Oversight:  - Oversee the technical aspects of solution development, ensuring alignment with the defined architecture and best practices. - Monitor progress, quality, and technical challenges, and implement corrective actions as needed.  6.  Stakeholder Communicatio n: - Act as the primary point of contact for customers, keeping them informed of project progress and addressing any concerns or changes in requirements. - Communicate project status, risks, and issues to senior management and stakeholders regularly. 7.  Quality Assurance : - Implement rigorous testing and quality assurance processes to ensure the developed solutions meet quality standards and customer expectations.  8.  Deployment and Adoption Handover : - Collaborate with the operations team to ensure a smooth transition for solution deployment and adoption. - Provide necessary documentation and training materials to facilitate successful adoption.  9. Continuous Improvement: - Evaluate project outcomes and performance to identify areas for improvement in processes, methodologies, and tools. - Implement lessons learned to enhance future project efficiency and effectiveness.  Qualifications and Skills: - Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., Computer Science, Business, Engineering). - Proven experience in project management, especially in digital transformation projects. - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate customer needs into technical solutions. - Familiarity with software architecture principles and best practices. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to interact with customers and project stakeholders. - Proficiency in project management tools and methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum, Waterfall). - Leadership qualities and the ability to motivate and manage cross-functional teams. - Strong organizational skills and attention to detail. - Experience with resource management and allocation. - Continuous learning mindset to stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends.   The Project Manager - Solutioning role is instrumental in bridging the gap between customer requirements and technical solutions, ensuring the successful delivery of digital transformation projects. It demands a unique blend of technical expertise, project management skills, and effective communication to drive project success and customer satisfaction.  Preferred candidate profile  : Project Coordinators/Project Managers- worked for the IT company having Knowledge with SDLC, agile, end to end project management. Perks and benefits

column2: Greetings from Seventh Contact Hiring Solutions!  About us: We are a professionally managed mid-sized progressive recruitment company based in Chandan Nagar (Kharadi), Pune. We provide recruitment services to start-ups to mid-sized IT and Engineering companies. We are a team of 15 recruiters. URL  www.seventhcontact.com Address  Chandan Nagar, Pune. (near Kharadi) Background of the role:  As a part of our growth plan, we would like to augment our recruitment deliverables using technology - building tools, platforms and automating existing systems and processes. This will help us in delivering better services at the same time make our services available to larger number of clients and candidates. With this intention we would like to hire a suitable person to lead this technology initiative. The following are the details of this job -  Role    Technical Project Manager/Business Analyst Work Mode  Hybrid (Kharadi, Pune) Nature of Job  Initially flexible to part-time and as the role grows then full-time.   Job Description  Illicit requirements by asking relevant questions to the sponsor and meticulous documentation. Convert the requirement into a high-level design document. Prepare the project plan, project estimate, time-lines in a relevant project management tool. Convey the requirements and deliverables to the technical team (inhouse or outsourced) Manage timely project deliverables as per schedule and reporting. Further ensure smooth implementation, maintenance and support. Closely monitor the application and initiate enhancement proactively or as and when required.   Job Specification  Should have relevant experience in Project Management preferably in product development or e-commerce web applications. Should have played a role as Project Manager or Business Analyst in the previous work experience. Should be adept with latest software development practices. Should be able to provide technology guidance to the stakeholders and provide them with optimum technical solutions. Selecting the right technology stack based on the functionality, scale and cost. Some background in hands on development will be an added advantage. Should be able to identify automation opportunities in the current way of working ??convert them in to a project, develop and implement the same. Should have experience in developing software tools or products using Open-Source Technologies. Please note the following while you apply for this role ?? We are looking for candidates based in Pune This is a remote working with a need-based visit to office based in Chandan Nagar, Pune. Hence, candidate should be based in Pune preferably in the east of Pune (Kharadi, Hadapsar area)   This role is also ideal for technology professionals who may have taken a long career break due to personal reason and would like to pursue their career in IT.  For this role we are looking for professionals who understand the role of technology as a way to bring about ease to the consumers and a means to scale and growth. The person should be passionate about providing technology solutions to solve problems.  The budget for this role is very limited but will get better as we progress and hence professionals seeking flexibility, empowerment, meaningful engagement and sense of contribution should only apply. If salary is the primary motivation, then you may consider not to apply.    Please read the details of the requirement carefully and apply if you meet the mentioned criteria and you resonate with the role.

column2: Job Description: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated IT Project Manager to join our dynamic team. The successful candidate will play a key role in planning, executing, and delivering IT projects on time and within scope. If you have a proven track record of successfully managing complex IT projects, excellent leadership skills, and a strong understanding of technology, we invite you to apply. Responsibilities: Collaborate with stakeholders to define project scope, objectives, and deliverables. Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, resource requirements, and budget estimates. Conduct feasibility studies and risk assessments. Execution and Monitoring: Lead project teams in executing tasks according to the project plan. Monitor project progress against timelines and milestones.
