column2: Role & responsibilities   Job Title: Project Manager (Agile Methodology) - Fintech Sector Job Description: We are seeking an experienced Project Manager with expertise in Agile methodology and a strong background in fintech. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of successfully leading projects in the financial technology industry, delivering high-quality products within budget and on schedule. As a Project Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the planning, execution, and delivery of projects, working closely with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with business goals and objectives. Your ability to effectively communicate, prioritize tasks, and adapt to changing priorities will be essential to your success in this role. If you thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and have a passion for driving innovation in fintech, we want to hear from you. Responsibilities: 1.Lead and manage projects from initiation through delivery, ensuring adherence to project scope, timeline, and budget. 2 . Employ Agile methodology to facilitate efficient project execution, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives. 3 .Collaborate with stakeholders to define project objectives, scope, and success criteria, ensuring alignment with business goals. 4 .Develop and maintain project plans, schedules, and resource allocations to support timely project delivery. 5.Identify and mitigate project risks, escalating issues as needed to ensure resolution and minimize impact on project timeline and quality. 6.Foster a culture of continuous improvement, driving team collaboration and innovation to optimize project delivery processes. 7.Communicate project status, updates, and key milestones to stakeholders, including senior management, ensuring transparency and alignment. 8.Facilitate effective communication and collaboration among cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment on project priorities and objectives. 9 .Manage stakeholder expectations and negotiate priorities as needed to ensure successful project outcomes. 10.Conduct post-project reviews to capture lessons learned and identify opportunities for process improvement. Requirements: 1 .Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. 2.Proven experience as a Project Manager in the fintech industry, with a minimum of 10 years of relevant experience. 3.Strong understanding of Agile methodology, with experience leading Agile teams and implementing Agile best practices. 4. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively engage and influence stakeholders at all levels of the organization. 5 .Solid understanding of fintech products, services, and market trends, with a passion for driving innovation in the financial technology sector. 6 .Highly organized with strong attention to detail, able to manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks effectively. 7.Strong leadership skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire cross-functional teams to achieve project goals and objectives. 8.Proven track record of delivering projects on time, within budget, and with high quality. 9.PMP, Scrum Master, or other relevant certifications are a plus. 10 .Experience with project management tools such as Jira, Asana, or Trello is preferred. Join our dynamic team and play a key role in driving the success of our fintech projects. Apply now to be considered for this exciting opportunity! Preferred candidate profile   Should be experienced from Fintech  Only Immediate Joiner  Perks and benefits   Mobile Reimbursement Insurance  Etc ,

column2: Intone Networks is looking for Sr. IT Project Manager to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      An IT Project Manager is a professional responsible for planning, executing, and finalizing information technology projects within an organization      They are responsible for delivering projects on time, within budget, and meeting all specified requirements      IT Project Managers work with cross-functional teams, stakeholders, and vendors to ensure successful project delivery and alignment with the organization's strategic goals        Key Responsibilities:        Project Planning: Collaborate with stakeholders to define project scope, objectives, and deliverables      Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, milestones, resource allocation, and risk management strategies      Resource Management: Identify and allocate appropriate resources, including personnel, equipment, and budget, to ensure project success      Continuously monitor and optimize resource utilization      Risk Management: Identify potential risks and create mitigation plans to minimize project disruptions      Regularly assess project risks and take corrective actions as needed      Project Execution: Lead and manage the project team in the execution of tasks, ensuring adherence to the project plan and schedule      Provide clear direction and support to team members      Budget Management: Monitor project expenses and ensure projects are delivered within the allocated budget      Prepare budget reports and make recommendations for cost optimization      Communication: Establish effective communication channels with stakeholders, team members, and senior management      Provide regular project status updates, reports, and presentations      Quality Assurance: Define and enforce quality standards for project deliverables      Conduct regular quality reviews to ensure that project outcomes meet established criteria

column2: The Project Manager/Business Analyst is responsible for overseeing and managing projects within an organization, ensuring that they are delivered on time, within budget, and meet the business requirements      This role requires a combination of project management and business analysis skills, as the individual will be responsible for gathering and documenting business requirements, analyzing processes, and managing project timelines and resources              Key Responsibilities:      1. Project Management: (It Services/Web Development)        Plan, execute, and monitor projects from initiation to completion, ensuring adherence to project timelines, budgets, and quality standards.    Define project scope, objectives, deliverables, and success criteria in collaboration with stakeholders.    Identify and manage project risks, issues, and dependencies, implementing mitigation strategies as necessary.    Develop and maintain project documentation, including project plans, schedules, status reports, and stakeholder communications.      2. Business Analysis:    Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, analyze, and document business requirements, ensuring alignment with project goals.    Conduct gap analysis to identify areas for process improvement and develop recommendations for enhancing operational efficiency.    Facilitate requirements workshops and meetings to elicit and prioritize stakeholder needs.    Translate business requirements into functional specifications and user stories, ensuring clear communication to development teams.      3. Stakeholder Management:    Engage with internal and external stakeholders to build strong relationships and manage expectations throughout the project lifecycle.    Communicate project updates, risks, and issues to stakeholders, ensuring timely and effective communication.    Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, testers, and subject matter experts, to ensure successful project delivery.    Conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) in coordination with stakeholders to validate solutions against business requirements.      4. Quality Assurance:    Conduct regular project reviews to ensure compliance with established quality standards.    Implement quality assurance processes to identify and resolve issues, ensuring project deliverables meet the desired level of quality.    Monitor project performance metrics and KPIs to measure project success and identify areas for improvement.      5. Continuous Improvement:    Stay updated with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in project management and business analysis.    Identify opportunities for process improvement and propose innovative solutions to enhance project delivery and efficiency.    Actively contribute to organizational knowledge management by documenting lessons learned and sharing best practices.        Qualifications and Skills:          Bachelor s degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, or a related field (Master s degree preferred).      Proven experience as a Project Manager or Business Analyst, preferably in a technology-driven environment.      Strong understanding of project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum, Waterfall) and business analysis techniques.      Proficient in project management tools and software, such as JIRA, Trello, or Microsoft Project.      Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and critical thinking skills.      Exceptional verbal and written communication abilities, with the capacity to engage and influence stakeholders at all levels.      Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.      Collaborative team player with the capacity to work independently and lead multidisciplinary teams.      Relevant certifications (e.g., PMP      , CBAP) are highly desirable.              Job description            The Project Manager/Business Analyst is responsible for overseeing and managing projects within an organization, ensuring that they are delivered on time, within budget, and meet the business requirements      This role requires a combination of project management and business analysis skills, as the individual will be responsible for gathering and documenting business requirements, analyzing processes, and managing project timelines and resources                  Key Responsibilities:      1. Project Management: (It Services/Web Development)      Plan, execute, and monitor projects from initiation to completion, ensuring adherence to project timelines, budgets, and quality standards.    Define project scope, objectives, deliverables, and success criteria in collaboration with stakeholders.    Identify and manage project risks, issues, and dependencies, implementing mitigation strategies as necessary. column2: Role & responsibilities   Description:  Position Overview: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Project Manager to join our Argus Consulting Services team. The Project Manager will play a critical role in leading and managing Argus implementation projects for our clients in the pharmaceutical and life sciences industry. The ideal candidate will have strong project management skills, deep knowledge of the Argus Safety database system, and a proven track record of successfully delivering complex projects on time and within budget. Responsibilities:  Project Planning and Execution: Develop comprehensive project plans, timelines, and budgets for Argus implementation projects, ensuring alignment with client requirements and organizational goals. Coordinate project activities, resources, and deliverables to ensure successful project execution and delivery within defined scope, timeline, and budget. Client Communication and Relationship Management: Serve as the primary point of contact for clients throughout the project lifecycle, providing regular updates on project status, milestones, and deliverables. Build and maintain strong client relationships through effective communication, responsiveness, and delivery of high-quality project outcomes. Team Leadership and Collaboration: Lead cross-functional project teams, including Argus consultants, technical experts, and other stakeholders, to achieve project objectives and deliverables. Provide direction, guidance, and support to team members, fostering a collaborative and results-oriented work environment. Risk Management and Issue Resolution: Identify, assess, and mitigate project risks, issues, and dependencies that may impact project timelines, budgets, or deliverables. Proactively address challenges and obstacles, seeking input from stakeholders and implementing effective solutions to keep projects on track. Quality Assurance and Compliance: Ensure adherence to industry standards, regulatory requirements, and best practices in pharmacovigilance and drug safety throughout Argus implementation projects. Conduct regular quality assurance reviews and audits to assess project deliverables, processes, and documentation for accuracy, completeness, and compliance. Qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in life sciences, pharmacy, computer science, or a related field. Minimum of 8 years of experience in project management, preferably in the pharmaceutical or life sciences industry. Strong knowledge of the Argus Safety database system and its implementation in pharmacovigilance. Proven track record of successfully managing complex projects, including planning, execution, and delivery. Excellent communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with diverse stakeholders. PMP certification or equivalent project management credentials are preferred. Familiarity with regulatory requirements and guidelines related to pharmacovigilance and drug safety (e.g., FDA, EMA, ICH) is a plus. Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: Position  : Customer Success Project Manager  Qualification  : BE/BTech/ME/MTech/MS/ MCA Experience : 2-7 years  Job Title:  Customer Success Project Manager (CSPM) Company:  Virtuos Digital Ltd Location:  Gurgaon Department:  Customer Success and Project Management Reporting to : Head of Project Management or Delivery Head.   Position Overview: As a Customer Success Project Manager (CSPM) at Virtuos Digital, you will be the steward of our clients' strategic initiatives, driving project excellence across onshore and offshore engagements. Your responsibility is to ensure every project under your management achieves its objectives on time, within budget, and at the highest quality. Key Responsibilities: Lead the end-to-end project management cycle for critical client projects, ensuring effective collaboration with internal teams and external partners. Craft and validate project scope, goals, and deliverables in alignment with client needs and company objectives. Construct comprehensive project plans that accommodate client requirements and business constraints, with the acumen to adapt to evolving scenarios. Govern project resources, ensuring optimal allocation and availability, while maintaining a seamless workflow. Uphold rigorous project timelines, proactively managing changes in project scope, schedule, and costs. Employ a suite of project management tools and methodologies to track progress, measure performance, and facilitate transparent communication. Nurture strong, constructive relationships with clients, team members, and stakeholders, serving as a reliable point of contact. Implement risk management strategies to identify potential project pitfalls and mitigate their impact. Preserve a holistic oversight of multiple concurrent projects, prioritizing and delegating effectively to meet strategic objectives. Forge and sustain partnerships with vendors and third-party contributors, ensuring the alignment of external expertise with project goals. Document all project phases meticulously, maintaining a repository of project histories and lessons learned. Qualifications: A robust educational foundation, with a preference for degrees in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Demonstrable experience in project management within the IT sector. A solid technical understanding, with experience in software development and web technologies. Exceptional client-facing and internal communication capabilities. Strong organizational proficiency, with keen attention to detail and the ability to juggle multiple tasks efficiently. Proficiency in Microsoft Office and familiarity with project management software. A holistic view of project interdependencies and the agility to navigate complex project landscapes. Project Management Professional (PMP) or PRINCE II or Scaled Agile certification is an asset. What We Offer: A chance to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment that challenges you to grow professionally. Direct impact on the success and growth of the company and its clients. Collaboration with senior leadership and opportunities to shape the future trajectory of the organization. A culture that offers growth prospects, continuous innovation, fair play and happy work environment.

column2: Explore career opportunity with a Fintech company operating Since 2014, it has been simplifying the lending process for millions of Canadians facing all types of financial circumstances.  Company offers a growing range of financial products and services which currently include personal loans, mortgages, credit cards and secured loans - all of which are made available to Canadians without having to visit a branch! Management team members We are high-energy entrepreneurs who operate with a real sense of urgency. Company has created some of the best in market products and sales processes allowing millions of Canadians to get access to financing online, via text or over the phone  all from the comfort of their own home!  Company is looking for Technical Project Manager with good expertise in Project Management involving Flutter , AWS Cloud , Python , Flask etc. Designation : Technical Project Manager Work Location : Gurgaon  Years of Experience : 5 to 10 Years Desired Notice : Max 15 Days   Qualifications : Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, or a related technical field. Role Overview: Company is seeking a highly motivated and experienced Technical Project Manager to lead and drive the successful execution of its projects. As the Technical Project Manager, you will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, engineers, designers, and stakeholders, to ensure the timely delivery of its innovative products and solutions. Your strong technical background, project management expertise, and exceptional communication skills will be instrumental in overseeing the entire project lifecycle and driving projects to completion. Responsibilities: Project Planning and Management: a) Define project scope, goals, and deliverables in collaboration with stakeholders and executives. b) Develop comprehensive project plans, including timelines, resource allocation, and risk management strategies. c) Monitor project progress, identify potential roadblocks, and proactively implement corrective actions to ensure project success. d) Conduct regular project status meetings, provide timely updates, and effectively communicate project-related information to stakeholders. Team Coordination and Leadership: a) Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and ensure alignment with business objectives. b) Facilitate effective communication and collaboration among team members, fostering a positive and productive work environment. c) Lead and motivate project teams, providing guidance, support, and mentorship to achieve project goals. d) Identify and address resource gaps, escalating issues to senior management when necessary. Technical Expertise and Quality Assurance: a) Possess a deep understanding of the technical aspects of projects, ensuring feasibility and effective implementation. b) Experience with AWS Cloud technologies - Serverless & Containerization platforms c) Experience or knowledge in Python, Flask framework ) Exposure or knowledge of Flutter App development & Git - Work closely with engineering and design teams to translate product requirements into technical specifications. - Conduct regular quality assurance reviews, testing, and validation to ensure deliverables meet the defined standards and requirements. Risk Management and Issue Resolution: a) Identify potential risks and issues that may impact project timelines, budgets, or quality, and develop mitigation strategies. b) Proactively resolve project-related issues, making data-driven decisions and managing stakeholder expectations. c) Escalate critical issues to senior management and provide recommendations for resolution. Requirements: 1. Proven experience as a Technical Project Manager, leading and delivering complex software development projects within an agile environment. 2. Atleast 3+ years of experience in technical project management and 4+ years in a technical role earlier and 2+ years in roles involving App development. 3. Strong knowledge of project management methodologies, tools, and techniques. 4. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders. 5. Solid technical background, with a good understanding of software development principles and practices. 7. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with a detail-oriented approach. 8. Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and handle multiple priorities simultaneously. 9. Project management certifications (e.g., PMP, Agile) are a plus. If the shared opportunity is relevant and of your interest share your updated CV along with following mandatory details. Current Company : Designation : Current Location : Are you open to work in Gurgaon ( Yes/No ) : Total years of experience : Years as experience as Technical Lead / Project Manager   : Self Rating in sacle of 1-5 ( 5-Best) for the following skills : a) AWS Cloud  b) Flutter  c) Python  d) Flask Framework Rate your English Communication skills both verbal and Written ( Excellent , Very Good , Good , Average , Poor ) Current CTC : Expected CTC : Notice Period ( 10-15 days preferred ) : Reason for Change :

column2: Job Title:  Technical Project Manager / Scrum Master Department:  Technology Company Introduction Genea was built on a foundation of listening to and serving the needs of our commercial real estate customers, starting with our flagship Overtime HVAC product. Over the years, we've earned the trust and loyalty of 21 of the top 25 largest commercial real estate companies in the US and continue to prove our value to them every day. Our clients rely on us to develop value-added technology solutions to solve other pain points in their operations. We have expanded our product portfolio to serve the complex and expanding needs of property teams. Genea is a family of solutions designed to improve commercial real estate operations through cutting-edge technology. We revolutionize access control, streamline overtime HVAC, and economize submeter billing. Our suite of cloud-based, automated solutions is built to cut costs, reduce admin times, and maximize the tenant experience. Experiencing enormous growth with aggressive expansion plans, Genea is expanding its Software Development and Operations center in India and is looking for dynamic engineering leaders who can become part of this already successful growth story and partner in creating a world-class team and products. Overview We're looking for a Scrum Master who knows the ins and outs of tech and Agile methods. You should have a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or something similar, and you really need to know your Agile stuff, proven by some kind of certification. We want someone who has already shown they can lead tech teams using Agile, someone who's comfortable talking tech and can keep projects moving smoothly. You should be great at running Agile meetings, getting everyone working together, and making sure the team is always getting better. It's important that you're good at talking to all kinds of people, figuring out problems, and using tools like Jira or Monday to keep track of everything. Plus, you should always be eager to learn more and stay on top of the latest tech and Agile trends. If you're all about guiding teams, solving problems, and making projects succeed, we'd love to have you join us. Duties and Responsibilities: Leading and managing multiple SCRUM teams to ensure projects are delivered within the agreed timelines and scope. Facilitating SCRUM ceremonies, including planning, daily stand-ups, reviews, and retrospectives, to promote continuous improvement and operational efficiency within the teams. Serving as the primary point of contact for all project-related communications, effectively managing stakeholder expectations through transparent, timely, and effective communication strategies. Developing, maintaining, and sharing comprehensive project documentation, such as project plans, progress reports, and performance metrics, to keep all stakeholders informed and engaged. Designing and implementing dashboards to track and display key performance indicators (KPIs) for SCRUM teams, providing insights into team performance, and project progress, and identifying areas for improvement. Proactively identifying and addressing potential risks and obstacles, implementing effective solutions to mitigate impacts on project timelines and deliverables. Collaborating closely with product owners, developers, and cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with project objectives and the overall goals of the company. Championing the adoption of best practices in project management and Agile methodologies across the organization to foster a culture of innovation, agility, and velocity. Engaging in storytelling to articulate project goals, progress, and outcomes, fostering a culture of transparency, teamwork, and shared vision among team members and stakeholders. Exhibiting superior organizational and follow-up skills, effectively coordinating and prioritizing multiple tasks and projects without compromising attention to detail. Maintaining a hands-on, roll-up-your-sleeves approach with a high sense of urgency and a drive for results, supporting both business-as-usual operations and the implementation and administration of new projects. Demonstrating excellent note-taking skills during meetings and ensuring the immediate sharing of minutes with all relevant groups to maintain project momentum and clarity. Helping to build a productive environment where team members feel a sense of ownership and enjoyment in their work, contributing to the overall success and morale of the team. Establishing and maintaining productive relationships with internal departments, third parties, vendors, or integration partners to ensure seamless collaboration and integration of services and solutions. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related technical field (or equivalent experience) Certified Scrum Master (CSM) or equivalent Agile certification Proven experience as a Scrum Master, preferably with technical teams, in an Agile environment Strong technical background or familiarity with technical concepts, software development lifecycle, and practices Excellent understanding of Agile methodologies and frameworks (Scrum, Kanban, etc.) Ability to facilitate and drive Agile ceremonies effectively, encouraging collaboration and accountability Strong communication and interpersonal skills to engage with diverse stakeholders and team members Analytical mindset with the ability to identify and resolve impediments, fostering a high-performing team culture Experience with Agile tools (Jira, Trello, etc.) and proficiency in using data and metrics for decision-making Continuous learner with a passion for staying updated on industry trends and best practices Competencies: Diversity  - Shows respect and sensitivity for cultural differences; Educates others on the value of diversity; Promotes a harassment-free environment; Builds a diverse workforce.  Ethics -  Treats people with respect; Keeps commitments; Inspires the trust of others; Works with integrity and ethics; Upholds organizational values.  Adaptability  - Adapts to changes in the work environment; Manages competing demands; Changes approach or method to best fit the situation; Able to deal with frequent change, delays, or unexpected events.  Attendance/Punctuality  - Is consistently at work and on time; Ensures work responsibilities are covered when absent; Arrives at meetings and appointments on time.  Design  - Generates creative solutions; Translates concepts and information into images; Uses feedback to modify designs; Applies design principles; Demonstrates attention to detail.  Oral Communication  - Speaks clearly and persuasively in positive or negative situations; Listens and gets clarification; Responds well to questions; Demonstrates group presentation skills; Participates in meetings.  Problem-Solving  - Identifies and resolves problems in a timely manner; Gathers and analyzes information skillfully; Develops alternative solutions; Works well in group problem-solving situations; Uses reason even when dealing with emotional topics.  Professionalism  - Approaches others in a tactful manner; Reacts well under pressure; Treats others with respect and consideration regardless of their status or position; Accepts responsibility for own actions; Follows through on commitments.  Quality  - Demonstrates accuracy and thoroughness; Looks for ways to improve and promote quality; Applies feedback to improve performance; Monitors own work to ensure quality.  Quantity  - Meets productivity standards; Completes work in timely manner; Strives to increase productivity; Works quickly.  Safety and Security  - Observe safety and security procedures; Determine appropriate action beyond guidelines; Report potentially unsafe conditions; Use equipment and materials properly.  Teamwork  - Balances team and individual responsibilities; Exhibits objectivity and openness to others' views; Gives and welcomes feedback; Contributes to building a positive team spirit; Puts success of team above own interests; Able to build morale and group commitments to goals and objectives; Supports everyone's efforts to succeed.  Technical Skills  - Assesses own strengths and weaknesses; Pursues training and development opportunities; Strives to continuously build knowledge and skills; Shares expertise with others.  Written Communication  - Writes clearly and informatively; Edits work for spelling and grammar; Varies writing style to meet needs; Presents numerical data effectively; Able to read and interpret written information. column2: Job Brief         Software project managers are in charge of the planning, scheduling, budgeting, execution, and delivery of software and web projects.     They ensure the successful completion of all software projects and also oversee the people performing work on the projects.     We are looking for an organized, detail-oriented individual to join our team as a software project manager.     The responsibilities of the software project manager include overseeing software projects from start to finish, managing and motivating software developers and other team members, giving customer presentations, and writing project proposals      To be successful as a software project manager, you should have a good working knowledge of project estimation techniques and the ability to motivate team members.     Ultimately, a top-notch software project manager should have good communication and decision-making skills.         Roles and Responsibilities of Project Manager         Discussing potential projects and their parameters with clients and software developers.     Planning out the blueprints for software projects, including defining the scope, allocating resources, setting deadlines, laying out communication strategies, and indicating tests and maintenance.      Assembling and leading the project team.      Participating in and supervising each stage of the project.      Ensuring each project stays on schedule and adheres to the deadlines.      Creating a project budget and ensuring the project adheres to the budget as closely as possible.      Determining and overseeing consistent testing, evaluation, and troubleshooting of all products in all stages of completion.      Tracking milestones, deliverables, and change requests.      Serving as a liaison to communicate information regarding changes, milestones reached, and other pertinent information.      Delivering completed software products to clients and performing regular checks on the products performance.          Qualification and Requirements of Project Manager         A bachelor s/ master s degree in information technology, software development management, software engineering, computer science, or a related field.     Proven experience in project management and software development.      Good working knowledge of project estimation techniques.      Excellent technical knowledge      Good leadership, decision-making, and organization skills      Strong attention to detail and multi-tasking skills.

column2: About Tru Performance  Tru Performance is a Technology-driven company that partners with Fortune 500 companies, SMEs, and specialized IT service providers to help, manage and scale their business. We have offices on four continents, with our head office in Pune, India. We assimilate a team of experienced and skilled designers, developers, digital marketers, and IT specialists who aspire to create successful careers with customer satisfaction as their focus. With Tru Performance, you will always gain continuous learning and development opportunities by working on interesting, challenging, and client-facing projects.  Job Summary We are seeking a talented and experienced IT Project Manager with exceptional managerial skills to lead our web development team. The ideal candidate will be proficient in both front-end and back-end development technologies and possess the ability to oversee and coordinate all aspects of web development projects. As a key member of our team, you will play a crucial role in driving the development and maintenance of web applications, ensuring high performance, security, and user experience. Key Responsibilities 1. Web Development Management Leading web development projects from conception to delivery, ensuring adherence to timelines and quality standards. Coordinating with stakeholders to gather requirements, provide updates, and gather feedback. Managing a team of developers, assigning tasks, providing guidance, and fostering a collaborative environment. Implementing best practices and methodologies for efficient project execution and delivery. 2. Technical Leadership Lead a team of developers, providing guidance, mentorship, and technical expertise. Define technical requirements and architectural designs for web projects. Identify opportunities for process improvement and implement best practices to enhance development efficiency. Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in web development and recommend adoption where appropriate. 3. Full Stack Development: Designing, developing, and maintaining robust and scalable web applications. Writing clean, efficient, and well-documented code using appropriate technologies. Collaborating with front-end and back-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic. Troubleshooting and debugging issues to ensure optimal performance and reliability. 4. Team Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including design, product management, and quality assurance, to deliver high-quality solutions. Facilitate communication between team members to ensure alignment on project goals and priorities. 5. Quality Assurance: Conduct thorough testing and debugging of applications to identify and resolve issues promptly. Establish and enforce quality assurance processes to maintain code integrity and application performance. 6. Staff Augmentation Support: Assisting in the recruitment and onboarding of additional development staff as needed. Providing mentorship and support to junior developers to foster their professional growth. Qualifications Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience). Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies. Proficient in the design, development, and implementation of websites and web applications using WordPress and variety of technologies including but not limited to:     i)  Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (React, Angular, Vue.js)     ii) Backend: Node.js, PHP     iii)Databases: SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL), NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis)     iv)Cloud technologies : AWS, Azure  Excellent project management and leadership skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and delegate effectively. Strong communication and interpersonal abilities, with the capacity to work effectively with cross-functional teams. Experience in staff augmentation or team management is a plus.

column2: Responsibilities      Craft strategic project plans and task breakdowns with input from team members and discipline leadership. Project plans should incorporate iterative milestones, illuminate project risks, align delivery with set timelines and budgets, and account for resourcing availability. All task breakdowns should have discrete estimates.         Successfully execute project plans by exhibiting ownership of task assignments to assigned project personnel, proactively removing blockers, and ensuring alignment of production output with expected milestones.         Deliver fixed price, retainer, and TM projects within expected timelines and budgets.         Act as the day-to-day Project Manager for 4 - 7 active client projects, exhibiting senior-level ownership over all client meetings, written status updates, demos, and iterative scope / expectation management.         Possess superior project awareness at all times, proactively tracking project budget and scope, identifying risks and mitigation paths, and delivering thoughtful, routine, comprehensive client updates.         Ensure superior quality deliverables by engaging cross-discipline leadership, enforcing rigorous QA processes and standards, and taking senior-level ownership of end to end delivery and client satisfaction.         Leverage 10up tools, standards, and processes in all client work. Maintain highly collaborative relationships with discipline directors to achieve elite project outcomes.         Lead discovery engagements (onsite and remotely) that expertly define cross-discipline project requirements. Translate requirements into comprehensive project approaches / plans that align with established timelines and budgets and can be executed successfully by project teams. Collaborate with Accounts to develop scopes of work following discovery.         Demonstrate an expert understanding of underlying client business goals and objectives. Consistently identify strategic opportunities to engage with the 10up Account Management Team and collaborate towards building strong, long-term client relationships.         Demonstrate a senior-level consultative, client-focused approach that emanates expertise, professionalism, and transparency.         Maintain project forecasts in 10ups established resource forecasting tool, collaborating with Team Leads to adjust resourcing plans as necessary.         Deliver verbal and written project-centric feedback to personnel, celebrating successes and identifying any misalignments with expectations. Consistently provide visibility to the Team Lead when delivering this feedback.         Collaborate with Financial Manager to prepare invoices for all assigned project work.         Maintain an average minimum of 34 hours / week (85%) of billable work.     Requirements      An understanding of core 10up services and ability to leverage these disciplines to deliver successful client outcomes.         A practical understanding of the WordPress platform.         Excellent application of 10up processes, standards, and tools across projects.         Excellent verbal and written communication skills, both internally and externally.     Nice to have      3+ years of project management experience delivering full scope web projects for enterprise clients, ideally in an agency environment.         PMI, scrum certification, or equivalent experience.         Familiarity with Google Apps, Teamwork, 10,000ft, and Harvest.         Remote working experience. #LI-Remote

column2: We are looking for a responsible Project Coordinator to administer and organize all types of projects, from simple activities to more complex plans      Project Coordinator responsibilities include working closely with our Project Manager to prepare comprehensive action plans, including resources, timeframes and budgets for projects      You will perform various coordinating tasks, like schedule and risk management, along with administrative duties, like maintaining project documentation and handling financial queries      To succeed in this role, you should have excellent time management and communication skills, as you ll collaborate with clients and internal teams to deliver results on deadlines      Ultimately, the Project Coordinator s duties are to ensure that all projects are completed on time, within budget and meet high quality standards      Role: Project Coordinator is a professional who is often involved in the day-to-day operations of their assigned projects      They organize and communicate details related to a specific assignment or task while serving as an interface between team members and managers            Responsibilities        Coordinating project schedules, resources, equipment and information with concern stakeholders of the project (Internal Team).          Liaising with clients to identify and define project requirements, scope and objectives to meet the deadline and scope of work.          Ensuring that clients needs are met as the project evolves.          Break projects into doable actions and set timeframes.          Liaise with clients to identify and define requirements, scope and objectives.          Assign tasks to internal teams and assist with schedule management          Help project manage in prepare project budgets.          Analyze risks and opportunities.          Oversee project procurement management.          Monitor project progress and handle any issues that arise. column2: We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Project Manager to join our fast-paced digital marketing agency. As a Project Manager, you will be responsible for a specific project or several projects within the organization. You will be in charge of planning, monitoring and reporting the project with the use of various project management methodologies. This role requires strong communication skills, strategic thinking, and a deep understanding of digital marketing strategies and tactics. Qualifications and Requirements:  Experience of five or more years with several formal qualifications.  A bachelor's degree in IT, computer science, business management, or a related field.  Any relevant project management related experience.  A Project Management Professional (PMP) certification is preferred. Essential skills required:  Communication: Project managers must be effective communicators to convey ideas, expectations, and information to their team, stakeholders, and clients.  Leadership: They need to be able to lead their team to success by providing clear direction, motivation, and support.  Organization: They must be highly organized to manage multiple tasks, timelines, and resources simultaneously.  Time management: They must be able to prioritize tasks and manage time effectively to ensure deadlines are met.  Risk management: They must be able to identify potential risks and take measures to mitigate them before they can negatively impact the project.  Budget management: They need to be able to manage project budgets and make informed decisions to ensure the project stays within budget.  Problem-solving: They must quickly identify and solve problems that may arise during a project.  Adaptability: They must be adaptable and adjust plans and strategies to keep the project on track.  Teamwork: They must be able to work collaboratively with their team to achieve project goals.  Technical expertise: They must have a good understanding of the technical aspects of the project and be able to communicate effectively with technical team members. Project manager duties :  Ensure all projects are delivered on time within the stipulated scope.  Lead the initiation and planning of a project and ensure technical feasibility.  Ensure resource availability and allocation.  Develop a detailed plan to monitor and track the progress of the project.  Coordinate with internal and external parties for the flawless execution of projects.  Manage relationships between clients and stakeholders.  Measure project performance using appropriate project management tools.  Perform risk management analysis to reduce project risks.  Report and escalate to upper management as and when needed.  Create and maintain a comprehensive project documentation. Roles and Responsibilities:  Planning and Developing the Project scope of work: You will be responsible for establishing and handling client expectations, constructing a comprehensive project plan, defining the project's scope, and assigning duties to members.  Developing and Leading the Team: You will oversee a team to meet the client's vision and attain or exceed their expectations. You will be responsible for bringing together and managing the team to create a well-oiled project machine. Setting up the team with guidelines, mentoring, or coaching as and when needed.  Establish a Deadline and Monitor the Progress of the Project: Your duties will include a significant amount of planning and execution. You must constantly scrutinize how the project is moving forward. You will manage everything from developing an accurate timeline of project completion to ensuring activities get completed within the assignment's parameters. Moreover, you will also foresee client-side delays and inform the team of adjustments to the client's needs.  Identify and Resolve Issues That Arise: Every project has problems that need to be resolved. It is in the project manager's best interest to foresee any potential problems before they arise because they are the first people that clients and team members turn to when something goes wrong. The ability to adapt and solve problems is essential for maintaining project control. You must prepare in advance for several issues, including scope creep or the extension or modification of a project's deliverables over time. This typically happens when a project's scope isn't clearly specified from the beginning and can significantly impact the timeframe and budget.  Ensure Satisfaction With Stakeholders: Of all the people that work on a project, project managers have the closest relationships with stakeholders. As a result, it's critical that they maintain open channels of contact for updates and criticism. You will be responsible for updating the client if there are any problems or modifications to the project's timeline.  Performance Evaluation of the Project: You will be in charge of assessing the efficacy and efficiency of a project once it is completed. With efficient data collection throughout the procedure, you can pinpoint flaws and make plans on how to address similar problems in the future.
column11: Digital Marketing, Client Management, Client Coordination, PMP, Project Management, Account Management, Agile, Client Engagement, Project Delivery, Scrum, Client Account Management

Optimize costs and time utilization, minimize waste, and deliver projects on time & on budget as per the agreed scope with a high-quality result. Conduct requirements analysis, requirements elicitation, map business requirements to technology requirements, scope control, impact analysis of any scope changes across phases and prioritization based on customer needs and scope change management.     Drive the creation of common standards such as design documents, traceability matrix, bridge documents, analysis methodologies and solution artefacts.     Estimate the work plan and track the activities closely and report the progress on a regular basis.     Support system integration testing (functional / technical) and review/mentor team during test execution.     Support defining the test strategy and scenarios and understand the business impact of defects.     Identify and analyze root cause of defects and prioritize the defects based on their criticality and severity.     Establish a KM plan and platform that can be leveraged by new joiners to the project and ensure the learnings from the project are contributed to the KM repository.     Implement a framework to assess the skill level of the team and work with the team to define a skill enhancement plan and nurture the innovation potential within the team.     Provide individual and team mentoring, ensuring high levels of team engagement and developing capabilities within team.     Provide feedback and enable the team to perform independently and grow.       Qualification and Experience Required:       Project Management Professional (PMP) / PRINCE II certification is a plus Bachelor s / Master s Degree in Engineering or Computer Applications.     Overall experience required - 8 to 12+ years     2+ years of experience in Project Management is Mandatory.       Knowledge and Skills:       Excellent verbal and written communication skills in language to be supported.     Experience in troubleshooting in a technical environment and ability to contribute to technical action plans.     Minimum of 2+ years of experience in product/project management, people management, defining strategy & solutions.     Strong people management skills and ability to develop and lead team.     Ability to manage project priorities, constraints, risks & work well under pressure, manage competing demands to meet tight deadlines with strong follow through preferred.     Analytical and problem-solving skills for continuous evaluation of ways to improve performance and behavior, focusing on efficiency and quality.     Demonstrated ability to implement high quality software for series development.     Ability to work in inter-cultural, inter-disciplinary teams, across multiple time zones and flexibility to adjust to multiple demands, shifting priorities, ambiguity, and rapid change.

column2: As a Project Manager, you are responsible for leading customer-facing projects to ensure that the right solution is designed, developed, tested, and deployed within customer expectations and that project goals and objectives are well defined and achieved. In this role you must have a strong technical project management background and also have excellent organization, problem solving and communications skills. You must have a solid understanding of project management fundamentals and be comfortable communicating with a diverse stakeholder group including senior leaders both verbally and in writing.                             RESPONSIBILITIES:                               Ensure that best practices and defined project management processes and standards are adhered to for assigned projects with respect to scoping and planning, issue management, risk management, change management, quality management, etc.                             Establish the project plan baseline by collaboratively defining and documenting the project scope including key milestones and dependencies.                              Determine and define clear deliverables as well as roles and responsibilities for all assigned project team members.                             Identify and secure the necessary resources needed to execute the project plan.                             Work with LotusFlare s internal architect, engineering and design teams and externally with customer technical teams to ensure best practices are followed and optimal solutions are selected and developed.                             Drive project execution: track delivery, take ownership of change management, and proactively seek and resolve blockers.                             Assign and oversee the daily tasks of LotusFlare personnel assigned to the project while ensuring all team members are working toward established milestones.                             Conduct regular meetings to determine progress and address any challenges, issues, or questions regarding assigned projects.                              Prepare and provide periodic updates and status reports to different stakeholders, internal and external.                             Manage UAT and production releases, as well as project handover to our operational support teams.                             Be a part of a Global Delivery Team, share experiences and develop the PM discipline within LotusFlare with the aim to improve processes, methods and tools with creative ideas.                             Create and maintain project documentation.                              Work with the latest collaboration tools including Jira, Confluence, Trello, etc.                                                           REQUIREMENTS:                                                       Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, System Information, Engineering, Business Administration, or any other relevant majors.                             5 years experience in Project Management in a technical and/or software development environment, preferably in the Telecommunications sector and with exposure to Product Engineering teams as well as BSS/OSS development and integration.                             Demonstrated deep understanding of foundational Project Management processes, strategies, tools, and methods.                             A solid foundation in service-oriented and digital technologies to be able to understand service inter-dependencies and technical solutions for multi-tiered systems.                             Comfort and experience with cross-organizational communication; excellent written and verbal communication skills.                             Experience in delivering products against a plan in a fast-paced, multi-disciplined, and often ambiguous environment.                             Experience working independently to design, plan, and execute technical projects. column2: The Senior Project Manager role in the IT PMO is responsible for the assessment and successful implementation of large complex IT and Business Change programs and projects.             The role:           Ensure that all projects are delivered to timelines, budget and scope. Strong delivery focus is key.     Ensure that the appropriate structures, governance, roles and communication are in place and managed.     Develop and update project plans, budgets and resource plans for project execution and for business case submissions. Perform assessments and due diligence on business cases (including vendor contracts). Ensure they have been reviewed by other PMs or PMO leadership.     Responsible for managing and pro-actively reporting on plan, budget, scope, resources, project decisions, risks, issues and dependencies. Maintain and present project metrics to senior management.     Manage the relationship and overall engagement with implementation partners and vendors, as well as all stakeholders.     Provide input on overall project business value, using experience and knowledge to enable the team to achieve stated objectives, benefits and ROI. Advise on change management and adoption and assist in tracking post implementation benefits as appropriate.     Manage full handover to operational support and maintenance teams.     Ensure projects are fully closed out, with all deliverables completed and approved.     Be actively involved in process improvement activities within the Project Management group.     Provide coaching, mentoring and personal development of others as required.     Manage projects of all sizes (including portfolios or programmes if required), across all service lines.     Manage the development of business cases if required.               You will need:           10+ years of relevant experience managing and successfully delivering large complex projects (including large, cross functional, geographically dispersed project teams) within a large company.     Strong delivery and accountability ethos.     Strong relationship management skills across all organizational levels. Ability to work with senior level stakeholders, clients, vendors and external auditors.     To provide added value by challenging assumptions, being proactive, solution orientated and managing expectations.     Understanding and experience in delivering organizational change as part of IT projects. Ability to quickly understand a business area and/or a problem.      Experience in managing custom developed (internal and external) solutions as well as off-the-shelf or configured solutions, including dealing with challenging vendors.     Experience in managing projects with multiple workstreams. Ability to assess and implement the optimal approach.     Ability to manage and contribute to the creation of business cases, including vendor selection. Experience in negotiating vendor contracts.     Expertise in risk management and test strategy.     Excellent leadership, documentation and communication skills.     To be able to comply with company and Project Management processes, methodologies and training while working with minimal supervision.     Good negotiation and influencing skills.     Conflict Resolution and Problem Solving.     Agile, waterfall, hybrid and other methodologies.     CRO / Pharma / Regulatory (including 21 CRF Part 11, SOX) experience an advantage.     Bachelor s degree or local equivalent or equivalent work experience     PM certification an advantage

column2: Saltmine is looking for a Product Manager to join its platform team. We desire an individual enthusiastic about innovating and delivering top-notch product solutions for leading global corporations, optimizing their workplace portfolios post-pandemic.         Our mission involves assisting clients in planning workspaces more efficiently, accelerating design and construction, cutting project costs, and ensuring high-quality execution. This, in turn, enhances employee workplace experiences and ROI.         The platform team focuses on foundational modules providing essential capabilities, including typical enterprise SaaS features and intelligently managing organizational and workplace data.          This role entails expanding and maintaining core platform functions while spearheading the platforms evolution towards delivering an intelligent, user-friendly product experience in the post-pandemic landscape.               Responsibilities:               Oversee platform and product roadmap, balancing current priorities with future strategic planning.         Set and monitor quarterly goals for the Squad.         Break down requirements of major platform initiatives into actionable tasks.         Document, monitor, and revise various artifacts to support application development: PRD, process maps, use cases, UAT, project plans, knowledge bank, and release notes.         Craft user stories and facilitate grooming sessions with cross-functional teams.         Prioritize and monitor progress to ensure a top-notch customer experience.         Resolve issues and remove obstacles hindering product delivery.         Act as an expert on product offerings for both internal and external stakeholders.         Address customer requests and operational needs promptly.         Conduct market assessments, user interviews, and testing.         Demonstrate strong project management skills to ensure quality delivery.         Influence stakeholders with objective arguments.         Provide regular updates to align squad initiatives with organizational priorities.                   Profile Requirements:               Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field; Background in Construction Architecture is advantageous.         Collaborate with UX/UI designers to translate requirements into design concepts.         Minimum of 3 years of product management experience, with hands-on SaaS product management experience; Enterprise B2B experience preferred.         Strong background in platform products is a plus.         Excellent communication skills, with the ability to influence across departments.         Ability to build and maintain strong relationships.         Experience in web product design and understanding of web technology.         Proficiency in Agile methodologies and working with Scrum teams.               Personal Competencies:               Smart and Get Things Done         Thrive in a fast-paced, global startup environment.         Outcome-oriented, highly self-motivated, and quick to learn.

column2: ?           Guides and coaches the Scrum Team (Product Development Team) on how to use Agile practices and principles to deliver high-quality product standards.     Gets a team to a high-performing level by recognizing areas of strength and improvement and employing appropriate coaching and development techniques.       Proven experience in removing impediments/blockers for the Scrum Team.     Responsible for ensuring Scrum is understood, and the team adheres to Scrum values, principles, practice, and guidelines.     Coaches the Scrum team in self-organization, cross-functional skillset, and domain knowledge, and communicates effectively, both internally and externally working within the Scrum team.     Works with the Scrum Team, as well as internal and external stakeholders, to influence and drive decision-making and support organizational project or product teams.     Resolves team impediments with other Scrum Masters to increase the effectiveness of the application of Scrum within the organization.       Works with Agile coaches and other Scrum Masters to grow within the role.     Contributes to the advancement and improvement of Agile practices within the organization.     Facilitates and supports all Scrum events/ceremonies: Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review, Sprint Retrospective & Backlog Refinement.     Demonstrates Leadership by way of coaching, consulting, mentoring, and supporting Agile teams assigned to Product Dev, Business & Ops Team.     Manages and facilitates Scrum of Scrum events/ceremonies with multiple Scrum teams/feature teams.       Known Methodologies     Agile-Scrum   Agile-Kanban   Agile-Scrumban   CI-CD   Large Scale Agile - LeSS   Scaled Agile Framework - SAFe   Product Management       Key Qualifications:           Exemplifies and promotes Agile values and principles across multiple product squads.     Outstanding communication, facilitation, negotiation, and coaching skills.     Implementation knowledge of Agile frameworks or methodologies - i.e., Scrum, Kanban, Scrumban, XP, etc., on an enterprise level, as well as in-depth knowledge of traditional project management principles and practices.     Adept at refinement, story splitting, estimation, velocity, retrospection, and other Scrum techniques.     Planning and problem-solving with product development, operations, and business teams.     Product Organization/Startup experience is desirable.     Demonstrated experience facilitating meetings at multiple levels of an organization and an understanding of facilitation techniques.     Intermediate working knowledge of Microsoft Office applications, including but not limited to Outlook, Word, and Excel.     Certified Scrum Master (CSM) / Professional Scrum Master (PSM) / SAFe Scrum Master Certification is mandatory.

column2: Position Responsibilities: As Scrum master you will be the guardian of Scrum Team, someone that resolves impediments and have influence over the scrum processes. Everything from coaching team about agile scrum, facilitating the scrum ceremonies, releasing potentially shippable software. You must execute the backlog in consultation by product owner/manager, making sure that deliverables are on time with production quality. You need to be involved in team conflict resolution and must have excellent communication skills. You must be actively involved in technical matters thus finding out the gaps and ensuring product owner involvement in business decision and description of the functional flow. The selected candidate for this position will work on development and support of  ecommerce applications that are used to offer various parts, products and services to Business Regional & General Aviation (BRGA) as well as Commercial Airline (CA) customers across the world. This position involves working closely with other development / support teams in India and US. The selected individual will be a part of the engineering and technology team in India. Exhibits Lean-Agile Leadership - Helps the team embrace SAFe Core Values, adopt and apply SAFe Principles and implement SAFe practices. Facilitates preparation and readiness of ART Events - Work with the team/other Scrum Masters/Stakeholders/RTM to effectively plan the Program Increments (for the specific Scrum team) Capacity Planning: Check availability of resources in ones own team/dependent resources from any other team Understand the priority of the requirements from business and work with /guide the team to estimate in story points (establish normalize estimates) and commit based on the known average velocity/capacity of the team Work with the Product Owner/Business team in effective Pre-PI Planning Prepare Internal Team Milestones with dates (for Eg: Coding complete and code checked in, User Guide/Release notes inputs complete, demo with PO/Business team etc) and ensures they are in line with the PI Milestone dates. Reviews with RTM and publishes to team/business. Risks/Issues are documented, addressed and escalated as appropriate. Organize and facilitate Scrum Ceremonies during every PI (Ensures that the Scrum processes agreed are followed.). Note: Sprint Planning, Daily stand-ups, Sprint Backlog refinements, Sprint reviews, Sprint Demos, Sprint retrospectives Facilitates the teams progress toward team goals - Plan and track the team's progress regularly to ensure PI commitments are met. Report any impediments/dependencies, risks and issues on delivery commitments as early as possible to the RTM. The Scrum Master ensures that the team is fully functional and productive. Works towards improving the productivity of the development team in any way possible. Helps coordinate inter-team cooperation and helps team operate well on the Agile Release Train - Collaborates actively with other Scrum masters (Meta Scrum/Scrum of scrums) Discussing any dependencies Share team updates Adopting and sharing any best practices Communicate any change requests, its analysis and the solution proposal from the team to the RTM. Provide all needed support to the Scrum Team using a servant leadership style (by using persuasion rather than authority) and leading by example. Guide & coach (by asking powerful questions that are thought provoking) the Scrum Team on how to use Agile practices and values. Goal: Happy stakeholders/Fostering Self Organization- Issues should be removed by the team wherever possible. Makes the development team aware of the Scrum values. Supports the team rules - Guide and coach the Scrum Team regularly on applying the Agile mindset/best practices/ rules to their work processes. Drives Agile behavior in teams & ensures that the team is fully functional, productive and valuable. The Scrum Master is responsible for reinforcing them. Facilitate discussion and decision-making on identifying gaps and how to fill them appropriately. Fosters team collaboration and helps in resolving conflicts Supports the PO- Support/Discuss with the Product Owners, especially with the objective to refine and manage the respective product backlog. (Goal: Improve the Product Owners effectiveness by helping maintain the Product Backlog and ensures User Stories are detailed enough) Leads team efforts in relentless improvement- Identify and propose areas for improvement and issues affecting effectiveness that the Teams themselves might not be aware of. Work with the RTM/Engineering Manager based on the type of the issue. Eliminates Impediments - Remove impediments (road blocks) for the development team (or guide the team to remove dependencies / impediments where appropriate) by finding the right personnel to remove the impediment. The selected candidate would lead a team of 8-12 member team and would work with all the stakeholders to deliver the teams commitment. Selected candidates might have to work in shift hours (morning, general or night). Basic Qualifications (Required Skills/Experience): Thrives on Responsibility - to maximize the throughput of the team, assumes no authority, Showcases Leadership and guidance to team Humble  Willing to do whatever is necessary to help the team achieve its goal, leads by example to recognize the value in all team members Collaborative ??Ensures a collaborative culture exists within the team, if not, create such an environment for team to have open and honest conversations. Committed ??To following Scrum ceremonies, cadence, addressing impediments, supporting team in meeting the commitments Influential ??Should know to exert influence without resorting to being dictatorial; Active participation in spreading Agile mindset within the business unit / organization through coaching, trainings, leading CoEs/CoPs across the company Knowledgeable ??Have technical known-how (enough to effectively lead the team), product and market understanding or other specialized knowledge to help the team pursue its goal. Manages external interfaces as needed People issues ??Reports to / works with Engineering Manager Project Issues ??Reports to / works with RTM and or Engineering Manager Technical Issues if not possible to be resolved internally ??Reports to / works with Architects or Technical Leads or Engineering Manager Encourage / coach team members to communicate in English language in a simple and positive manner. Communicate regularly with the Engineering manager regarding issues identified within the team, steps taken to correct, any help needed. Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience): Minimum of 9 to 10 years of experience in software development, of which at least 4 to 5 years in leading teams as a Scrum Master. Certified SCRUM MASTER / any other equivalent Agile certifications (SAFe) Strong Knowledge of agile methodology and frameworks like Scrum, Kanban, XP, etc. Good Fundamentals on Agile Methodology is mandatory. Exposure for Tools like JIRA, Jama, and Confluence is mandatory. Mentorship skills to coach team how to follow agile scrum, which really works. Understand the basic fundamentals of iterative and incremental development. Good Knowledge about tasks, backlog tracking, burn down / up metrics, velocity, user stories etc. Knowledge of other Agile approaches, like: Kanban, Crystal, FDD, XP, etc. Knowledge about other methodologies other than Agile-Scrum, so that he can explain other methodologies to motivate his team. Basic knowledge of software development processes and procedures to understand team needs. Knowledge in Agile techniques like: User Stories, Continuous Development & Integration, ATDD, TDD, Continuous Testing, Pairing, Automated Testing, Agile Games. Ability to take and understand your commitment to deliver the product on time. Know about the value of metrics and incremental delivery. Candidates with experience on ecommerce domain would be preferred Bachelor's degree in science, technology, applied mathematics or engineering is required and Master?? degree would be preferred. Minimum of 9 to 10 years of experience in software development, of which at least 4 to 5 years in leading teams as a Scrum Master. column2: 3+ years of work experience in the following:         We are seeking a skilled and experienced Scrum Master to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will play a crucial role in facilitating and optimizing the Agile development process.         The Scrum Master will work closely with cross-functional teams, ensuring the successful delivery of high-quality software products within the specified timelines.       You will: Be part of a team that solves business problems which involve:       Lead and facilitate Scrum ceremonies, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, sprint review, and sprint retrospective.         Foster a collaborative and self-organizing team culture, encouraging continuous improvement and innovation.         Act as a bridge between the development team and stakeholders, ensuring clear and effective communication to align with project goals.         Identify and eliminate impediments that hinder the team s progress, promoting a smooth and efficient development process.         Provide guidance and coaching to team members on Agile and Scrum principles, ensuring adherence to best practices.         Monitor and report on key Agile metrics to track team progress and identify areas for improvement.         Promote a culture of continuous improvement, fostering an environment where the team reflects on its performance and adapts accordingly.         Proactively identify and address potential risks and issues that may impact project timelines or quality.         Work with product owners and stakeholders to prioritize and plan upcoming sprints, ensuring alignment with business objectives.         Maintain and update relevant Agile documentation, including user stories, sprint backlogs, and release plans.       Good experience of:       Experience with software development methodologies beyond Agile/Scrum (e.g., Kanban, Lean), MIRO.         Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools.         Project management skills and familiarity with project management tools.         Continuous learning mindset to stay updated with industry trends.       Essential Education/Qualification:       Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.         Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) or similar Agile certification.         Proven experience as a Scrum Master in IT projects.         Strong understanding of Agile principles and practices.         Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.         Ability to lead and influence cross-functional teams.         Knowledge of Agile tools like JIRA, Trello and frameworks.

column2: The Scrum Master is a crucial role to the implementation of the "Scaled Agile Framework" (SAFe) as the agile development framework within AGCO. The role contributes to the definition and continuous improvement of all processes and tools necessary for it s agile teams to enable them to successfully deliver new products.                                ?             Your Impact                             ?             The Scrum masters main responsibilities are to generate flow, ensure fast feedback (minimize WIP) and strive for relentless team improvements:                     Assist in overall program/project planning and ensure cross-team dependencies are well-understood and modeled in project plans and timelines                  Identify, document, and publish risks and issues related to the overall program and to define resolution paths where required                  Resolve cross-team impediments and blocking issues                  Collect and consolidate cross-team status for delivery to stakeholders and executive management                  Schedule and conduct meetings and ceremonies in accordance with best practices for Agile/Scrum software development                  Responsible for building team collaboration, commitment towards achieving sprint objectives and viewing team needs above everything else                  Continuously work to improve team performance and productivity                  Encourage team accountability, self-organization, and empowerment                  Share common Agile practices                  Promote and support the development team s automated processes                  Facilitate Retrospectives which generate new ideas for process improvement                  Maintain relevant metrics that guide the development team to more efficient processes in their work and in satisfying their Product Owner and stakeholders                  Maintain effective information radiators that aid transparency and encourage clear communication between the development team, the Product Owner, and stakeholders                  Active participant in the local scrum chapters to share and learn new agile concepts.                     Your Experience and Qualifications                     3+ years experience in software development projects                  Ability to analyze and think quickly and to resolve conflict                  Knowledgeable in techniques to fill in gaps in the scrum                  Ability to determine what is scrum and what is not                  Experience with successful Agile techniques                  Ability to work with and lead a team                  Strong communication, interpersonal and mentoring skills                  Ability to adapt to a changing environment                  Self-motivation and ability to stay focused in the middle of distraction                  Knowledge of project management tools (Jira, Azure DevOps) advantageous                  Experience in DevOps and SAFe practices beneficial                          Your Benefits                     GLOBAL DIVERSITY - Diversity means many things to us, different brands, cultures, nationalities, genders, generations - even variety in our roles. You make us unique!                  ENTERPRISING SPIRIT- Every role adds value. Were committed to helping you develop and grow to realize your potential.                 POSITIVE IMPACT - Make it personal and help us feed the world.                 INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGIES - You can combine your love for technology with manufacturing excellence - and work alongside teams of people worldwide who share your enthusiasm.                 MAKE THE MOST OF YOU - Benefits include health care and wellness plans and flexible and virtual work option
